We booked Cindy and Bill’s house because our friends were all signed up to do the Death Ride in Markleeville. We arrived Thursday evening and when I couldn’t locate the code to the private community, I was able to contact Cindy and she responded immediately. The next morning as we were getting ready to head into Turtle Rock Park to pick up our bibs for the ride, we met Cindy and Bill. We quickly chatted and learned that Cindy and her daughter also completed the Death Ride together many years ago. Unbeknownst to everyone, a wild fire started in Markleeville and unfortunately, the Death Ride was cancelled. Our group made the decision to head home a day early since the ride was cancelled. After we cleaned up the house and left, I messaged Cindy to let her know that we’ve checked out. She quickly responded and suggested that we contact Airbnb to see if they’d refund our one night stay because of the extenuating circumstances from the fire. Before I had a chance to contact Airbnb, Cindy already took care of everything and said they would be reaching out to me to finalize the credit. Thank you Cindy for your hospitality and going above and beyond your hostess duties to make sure our stay was memorable. I would highly recommend Cindy and Bill’s place and would come back again with my family.

The location of the home makes it easy for visiting and exploring all the attractions the area has to offer. Cindy is an attentive and gracious host. We look forward to staying here again.
We had a wonderful time. This home is lovely with incredible views. The home is very clean and well cared for. I highly recommend this home — we definitely hope to return. Excellent choice ❤️

Five star stay. Location is peaceful and quiet and the views are amazing in all directions. House is well appointed and immaculate. Hosts are well organized and very responsive. A little bit of heaven is an apt description. Would not hesitate to recommend.
The house is so beautiful and worth the $ the views are so beautiful especially at night time and in a nice and quiet neighborhood.

This place is amazing. The area has amazing views from every angle. You can even hear the creek near by, which my kids loved! The guesthouse is super clean and Billy and Cindy were so nice and helpful whenever we had any questions. You should stay here, you won’t regret it.
The place was as beautiful as the photos and perfect for a relaxing weekend trip to tahoe with friends :) would definitely go again!

This place was absolutely stunning.
The views in all directions are absolutely gorgeous, and the photos cannot fully capture how great they are. The nearby River made an extremely relaxing atmosphere. It was just a short drive away from key things in town, but is extremely private / isolated.
They also have INCREDIBLE water (it sounds crazy but it was actually a highlight of the place).

Our stay was amazing...this house is very private, extremely clean and organized. It is very conveniently located to South Lake Tahoe, but also easy to get to anywhere in Gardnerville, Minden, or Carson City fairly quickly. Cindy is an awesome host, very nice, friendly, and familiar with the area if you need information. She always responded very quickly to my inquiries. I highly recommend this beautiful house if you are in the area.

Cindy and Billy’s place was a gem! I stayed here this past weekend and the space fit my group of 5 quite nicely. The space provides comfort, privacy, cleanliness, and amazing panoramic views that are truly unforgettable! Kitchen was well-equipped with basic essentials from seasonings to cookware to make meals. Cindy was a great host, we appreciated her friendliness and attentiveness. I would recommend this space over and over again :)
House was very Clean & comfortable. Cindy was very helpful with leaving directions to stores & activities in the area. I would recommend to others
Great place for family’s especially if you have kids. Safe and open space. Just what you need for a family get away trip.

I would highly recommend staying here. We loved the house, the location and the property. The house is very clean and well stocked. Billy and Cindy thought of everything and even provided us with some chocolates and water for our stay. The view outside is simply breathtaking with beautiful hikes directly from the backyard. The property is located just a short drive away from Heavenly and South Lake Tahoe. Cindy and Billy were prompt with answering any questions we had before and during our trip. We personally met Billy during the trip and he was so kind and offered great suggestions. We would love to stay here again.

Five stars across the board! Cindy’s place is the perfect spot if you’re looking to stay close to south lake/heavenly, but prefer peace and quiet. The property borders public land and looks directly up at the eastern front of the Sierra, just incredible! Tons of nature and amazing sunrises and sunsets. The house was immaculate, communication excellent, location/scenery amazing, and we would certainly stay again. I personally met Cindy during our stay and she was very kind and approachable.
a must place Cindy is not only sweet and kind and thoughtful she has one of the cutest laid out spots ever look forward to coming back soon

Cindy's place is really great for small family. The views of snow mountains and sound of creek really makes you feel closer to nature. It's 20 min drive from Tahoe downtown and snow play area for kids. We enjoyed our stay.

We absolutely loved staying here! The house is lovely and the kitchen well stocked with supplies to stay in and cook. The views outside were beautiful as well with easy parking. The house is over a pass and about a 20 minute drive from heavenly village. Luckily the Nevada side stayed a bit warmer so even when 50/89 required chains we didn’t have any issues getting in and out from the Airbnb to the resort. We would definitely stay here again.

Highly recommend! The views are beautiful and the location is great if you want to go skiing in Tahoe. The home was very clean, peaceful, and we had a wonderful stay. Cindy and Billy were very helpful, responsive, and kind!

Cindy's place was exactly what it says a little piece of heaven!!!! It was very very clean and well stocked with everything we needed. Cindy was very quick to respond to all questions we had. Also she had great information on surrounding areas for us to enjoy! We really enjoyed our stay and felt right at home. Thank you so much Cindy for sharing your beautiful home with us!!!
Very beautiful and very clean house.

Little Bit of Heaven is such a great stay! It was perfect for our family of 3. Just a short drive from Heavenly Mountain and shops of South Lake Tahoe. Cindy and Billy were very prompt in answering any of our questions and offered great suggestions for activities. The stay was super clean and comfortable! Their dog, Stanley, was also very welcoming and adorable!
Very comfortable and clean home, with fantastic views. Would stay again, thanks Bill and Cindy!

Cindy was super helpful both during booking, check in, and after we checked out. The property is about 15 minutes outside of Tahoe with beautiful mountain and valley views which we loved waking up to! It had plenty of space for six adults and made for nice quiet evenings after snowboarding all day. She had waters and chocolates and a couple snacks in a welcome basket, a duraflame log for the wood stove, and make up removing wipes in the bathrooms provided. There was so much attention to detail, I would stay here again in a heartbeat! After we checked out one of our friends let me know that he had left an unusual item at the property. Cindy was quick to respond, found the item, and was willing to quickly ship it to us, which was above and beyond and very much appreciated!

A Little bit of heaven is a great place to get away from it all, it is a 20 minute drive to Lake Tahoe and the ski resorts. The house is located in a gated community and we were comfortable not locking our doors while out in town. The house is "immaculate" with the most beautiful views. You will be sure to enjoy the house and scenery. Bill and Cindy have done a fantastic job providing you with more than essentials. They have thought of everything that you need. Highly recommended!
A bit out of the way from Tahoe, but that's just what we needed. The house was warm, large and homey. Kitchen was complete for cooking Christmas dinner. Very peaceful.

What a great place! Perfect for a family of four! The house was very cozy, clean, and perfect location to South Lake Tahoe. We also enjoyed the local town with great recommendations from Cindy. The property is beautiful and secluded.
Well stocked kitchen. Beautiful hikes right from the backyard. And lovely views. Really enjoyed our stay.
Incredibly clean, comfortable & cozy venue with spectacular view. All amenities as stated and much more. Convenient location, super hospitable host. Highly recommend it!
Cindy has a beautiful home! And was very helpful with things to do. She was also responsive! She had great accommodations! I would definitely recommend! 10/10 no doubt!
This is one of the best places we’ve stayed at. The views are amazing and feels just like home. Definitely recommend it!!

This place has such a beautiful view! There’s a sound of a peaceful little stream right near the house that is so soothing to listen to. Even though we were in the guest house, we had all the privacy. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Cindy’s place was perfect for a weekend getaway - Great location and beautiful views!
What a great place to escape too. The place was clean, communication with the hosts was superb, and you have the mountain range in the back drop.
Everything in the house was very clean and tidy. View was very nice. Property owner was commutative at the right times and accommodating. Would recommend.

The stay at Cindy’s was great. We absolutely loved the amazing view! The size of the house is perfect for a single family. The amenities were great as well. Cindy made sure to provide extra towels, extra blankets and pillows. The kitchen was well stocked. There is no need for you to bring anything from home, the house has it all! This place is truly home away from home.

Cindy's place is lovely. The house is spacious and has everything you need to make yourself comfortable. It's the last house up the hill, so you have the desert mountains as your backyard. :-) There's also a stream of water running close to the house, making a very relaxing sound.
From the house, you have to drive around 15m to get to the lake. Given how good and comfortable Cindy's place is, the drive is worth it.

I planned a surprise birthday weekend for my fiancé and surprised him with his best buddy coming with his wife! The Airbnb was sparkling clean, the host was amazing- super responsive and helpful- even warned us of the bad air quality the week before. The place was in perfect condition- very nice amenities. It’s super clean, I didn’t even worry due to the pandemic. The location is great also- short distance to the casinos and to nice restaurants. Very quiet at night, beautiful views from the Airbnb, beds were very comfortable. We will definitely be back to stay here again!!

Cindy and Billy place is wonderful. Everything was as pictured and SUPER CLEAN. Large enough for a family of five. Modern features, FABULOUS views and beautiful decorations. Great location, close to grocery stores etc. Quiet and beautiful estates. Very relaxing place. This was just as described. The location is very convenient and there were very clear check-in and check-out instructions. I would highly recommend and book again. Thank you for the hospitality during our visit. We enjoyed everything about our stay at your home. From the moment of our arrival to our last minute at your place, we were treated like royalty. Thanks again for your time and generosity.

No Thanks!!
Plus I did not like the fact we were right next door to her house. I felt like we were watched every move.

We had a wonderful stay at Cindy’s place! The house was perfect for what we needed and super clean. It truly felt like home and all the thoughtful touches were the cherry on top. We would definitely stay here again.

If you want to stay in a peaceful, beautiful home in the perfect location, you have found it. A Little Bit of Heaven is just that. The home is in a great location. We visited Downtown Reno, Kings Canyon Waterfalls, & Nevada State Beach all while we were there in September. Cindy & Billy are impressively quick at responding to any concerns. I highly recommend staying in their perfect little home.

Cindy, was a Amazing host and was just as pleasant in person. The scenery was perfect the surrounding area was just as beautiful. The name that she chose for this Airbnb is a perfect match. It was a little bit of heaven.
You will NOT regret staying here. Cindy & Billy did an amazing job hosting my wife & I. We will definitely be coming back.

I stayed at Cindy's place for 2 nights and it was perfect! Cindy's communication before and during my arrival was great! A week before my arrival Cindy was kind enough to message me and inform me that the Northern CA wildfires had made a smokey appearance, then 2 days before my arrival she sent me a picture of an update reflecting clearer skies. The house was spotless clean. Just as envision in the pictures. Location is very tranquil and i loved walking out to hear the sound of water streaming close by. It is a short 20min drive to the casinos/state line. Would def recommend anyone to stay here who wants to be close to casinos but also enjoy natures peacefulness away from the crowds.

Cindy’s Place was great !! Everything we expected and more. They really did think of everything you can possibly need while your stay. The place has AC and heater. Definitely came in handy for these hot summer days. Was nice hearing the river from the house made it feel very relaxing. Lake Tahoe was just on the other side of the mountain which is about a 30-45 min drive depending on what beach you are going to. All restaurants and coffe shops are about 7-10min away from the property. Definitely a great place to stay and recommend to anyone looking to say in the Lake Tahoe , Gardnerville area. Worth every penny , thank you Cindy for allowing us to book and look forward to a future reservation !
Beautiful scenery. I loved it. Nice and quiet. I still cant get over the moutain views.
Clean and relaxed with everything you need

The house is seated in a gorgeous location with an incredible backyard that is waiting to be hiked! You’re close to Lake Tahoe, Carson City and within driving distance of Yosemite! The house will provide everything you will need to enjoy a lovely stay in Nevada.
Cindy was so very kind to our family. Many thanks for sharing your lovely home with us. We will be visiting again soon😊

Cindy was a great host and quickly responded to any question I had. The house was very clean. The location it self is about 20min away from state line, and had a great view of the mountains and valley. I highly recommend this location!

We enjoyed our stay very much. It’s a very comfortable place in a great quiet location. Cindy was so quick at responding and left some goodies and bottled water which we appreciated. The house was very clean and would recommend this “little bit of heaven “ place because it truly is great.

As described! We were looking for a nice quiet place close to the lake, but not close to people. House was clean and it was nice to be able to hear the creek nearby at bedtime. Would love to come back in the winter!

We had a great time at A little bit of Heaven place. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The neighborhood is very conveniently located and although it’s a lively neighborhood the house is very quiet! Would absolutely recommend to stay there!

I definitely recommend this great place with super hosts! Communication was excellent and timely, and their knowledge of local places was spot on. Don't overlook this place if you want to stay in the area.

This gorgeous home was a perfect getaway into exploring nature all around. The area Gardnerville has so many beautiful views and lakes that you can explore with the people closest to you. The hosts did an amazing job checking in and even having the home extremely clean! I really enjoyed my stay here.
Thank you!!!

What a special place. The location, the VIEWS, the privacy, the space, the cleanliness, EVERYTHING. This is by far the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in. We will absolutely be coming back. The pictures don't do it justice. Sitting out back and listening to the water and looking up at the mountain was so special. I would recommend it to anyone looking to stay in the area.
This home is breathing. The area is perfect for day fun out and about then come to serenity and rest. Loved the area!

My family and I loved our stay at Cindy’s place for the 4th of July weekend! The location of the property is great, it is about a 20 min. drive to Lake Tahoe. It’s perfect distance from all the fun but also enough distance to enjoy a relaxing weekend.
With the times we are living in right now it felt great having a place to stay away from the large crowds around the Casino area.
The house included all the amenities you would find in your own household and Cindy was always one message away if we needed anything.

Definitely one of the best guest houses my family has ever stayed in. The views from the property were amazing. Although we visited in summer, I can only imagine how magical winter looks with the mountains right in the backyard. The guest house was very clean at arrival, and found no issues during our stay. Highly recommend if visiting Lake Tahoe, Carson, or Reno!

This place was great! Beautiful clean home that was in a nice quiet area. The outside view was amazing, and it was a short drive to stores and the main Lake Tahoe area. Definitely recommend booking! Cindy and Bill were great hosts as well and easy to communicate with.

We LOVED our stay at Cindy and Billy’s Home! This was by far the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in! If your looking for a peaceful getaway this is the place! Amazing Views, especially the sunrise/sunset! This home was Spotless Clean and so inviting to my family! Thank you so much Cindy and Billy, you Both are amazing hosts!
Excellent place close to south lake and heavenly stagecoach entrance.. beautiful place to relax and amazing host!

This an absolutely perfect cottage - nicely decorated and very clean & comfortable. It had all the conveniences we needed and is in a setting that is awesome - majestic mountain and valley views and a running stream adjacent to the cottage. Definitely a keeper!

We loved our stay at Cindy and Billy’s home. It was a beautiful location, nestled against the mountain and the stream sounded lovely. Our daughter loved the rocks to play with outside and the scenery. Their place is super clean, well stocked with all you would need. Comfortable beds and a great place for a small family. We have 2 kids under 2 and it was perfect. Sweet of them to have some toys to play with too!

We stayed a weekend at Cindy and Billy's home. It was such a perfect little spot for our little family. The house was spotless and so inviting. They even had a welcome bucket in the fridge with waters and goodies for us to snack on. My kids were so happy to see that there were toys they could play with and games we could all play as a family. Cindy and Billy had everything we needed. The kitchen was fully stocked with seasons, oil, butter and everything we needed to cook a meal. The showers had shampoo, conditioner and body wash. They even had bathrobes for us to use. We had such a wonderful time staying here. The scenery was absolutely beautiful and the sound of the creek was so peaceful. My kids loved that they had a backyard of mountains to explore. Thank you so much Cindy and Billy for letting us stay in your home, it was truly an amazing getaway and definitely felt like a little piece of heaven. We will definitely be booking with you again in the future.

Wonderful stay at a beautiful property! Hosts were very accommodating and the communication was great! I would definitely love to stay there again! Beautiful land and the creek running next to the property was very serene!

Cindy was an amazing host! Checking in was a breeze. She was even kind enough to message us and ask if we need anything during our stay.
The place was great! It was VERY clean! It’s also secluded which was perfect because it was nice and quiet with amazing views to wake up to every morning.
It literally has everything you need. For dinner one night, we were able to stop by the grocery store to pick up ingredients to make pasta and cook some steaks and everything else you needed to prep and cook was there. Even down to the butter and seasoning!
Overall it was an awesome experience and I would definitely stay here again. Thank you again so much for everything! My family had a great experience

Cindy and Billy’s home is amazing. Just as described, a little bit of heaven. It is a perfect place to get away and enjoy some peace. Very beautiful views from the home, and drive up the mountains. Not only was the home outstanding, but so are the hosts!! Cindy and Billy are quick to help you get around and feel right at home! Everything was amazing, definitely recommend staying here for a few days!!
Cindy was a great host and the guest house was perfect. You won't regret it!

A Little Bit of Heaven is exactly that. The location of the property is far enough away from the crowds, but yet minutes away from both South Lake Tahoe, Heavenly ski resort and Carson City. The home is in a beautiful location towards the top of a hill with amazing views of both the valley below, the National Forest and the back of Heavenly ski resort. The soothing sound of the creek on the property, and the amazing stars above make for a peaceful environment. The home itself has warm and beautiful decorations. The kitchen is very well stocked with plenty of dishes, pots and pans and accessories. The master bedroom sleeps two very comfortably with a full bath attached and nice size closet. The second bedroom also sleeps two with a rack to hang clothes, and a full bath across the hall. There is a futon couch that will sleep two in the dining/common room with a fireplace and back patio with table and chairs. The family room has a sectional couch with an oversized comfortable chair. Cindy and Billy’s home felt like a home away from home to us. They have lots of family games to play, and even some toys for the little ones. They also have two full drawers of brochures for the surrounding areas and some magazines with information of the area.
Amazing host with a great location. Cindy and Bill and truly good people.
Very nice located home with an amazing view. Bill and Cindy were very nice. Great trip overall

We really like Cindy and Billy's place! The house is just like the pictures. Stylish and very cozy. Everything worked. I went with my eight month old baby and the kitchen was very equipped with everything I needed.
Unfortunately, on the last day we found 6 spiders around the house. We couldn't identify if they were poisonous. I took photos to review, but they were all over the house. That made me nervous because my baby is crawling and I lost the confidence to let him play, and I'm glad it was the last day. We believe they were in the fireplace, after lighting they spread around the house. Even with that, I would stay again. I hope they resolve this issue!

The house is beautiful and the views are incredible . Very comfy beds and the shower is very comforting. Thank you ! The only thing is that they ask you to leave the garbage on the other side of the bridge to take out the sheets and towels. We weren't bothered by that but the cleaning service was being paid for by Airbnb so we didn't extend because we had to do that . We would also go again!

Cindy is an outstanding host. The personal touches as well as her open and accommodating personality made our family feel welcome and embraced over the Xmas holidays. Her property is appropriately called, a little piece of heaven, and truly it is. Every room has a spectacular view and the property has a way of embracing you and making you feel as if you are nestling in the arms of the mountains. I can’t wait to return and hope to call this my little home away from home from now on.

Cindy was a fantastic host. She was so warm and welcoming when we arrived. She was super communicative and responsive leading up to and throughout our stay. She left little notes around the house, welcoming us and guiding us. She was even gracious enough to let us check in early to avoid traveling during a storm. And the views from her place were really stunning, especially at sunrise. Would definitely recommend to a friend and stay again. Thanks Billy and Cindy!
Great place! Mike was super helpful and we will be back.

My family and I enjoyed our stay and hope to return again in the future. To location is beautiful and the cottage was cozy, clean, and well appointed. A perfect place for our annual winter getaway weekend.

This Airbnb was great. It was nice to have more space. The gas fireplace heated the whole cottage and then some. It was convenient to downtown Markleeville where we ate dinner both nights. It had a kitchenette which was fine for breakfast food. The only negative was not close to a grocery store. So best to do your grocery shopping at home and bring supplies with you. We skied at Kirkwood 1 day snd the commute to resort was easy.

We come back to Mike’s cottage for the second time this winter. It has quickly become a favorite for our family. The cottage is tasteful, cozy and has everything you could ask for! Our kids loved sleeping in the loft and playing with all the games, and we loved to comfy bed and great shower after a long day in the slopes. We will be back again!

By far the best AirBnB I have ever experienced. The cottage has a great layout and attention to detail. Clearly a lot of thought went into amenities for the comfort of guests. The Carson River runs right along the back yard, with a patio for dinner beneath the cottonwoods. It may feel rugged and remote but is actually a short drive to Markleeville, the county seat. A half hour takes you into South Lake Tahoe or the spectacular Mokelumne Wilderness.

Great host! Super communicative. Property was great, location was beautiful! Lots of board games, awesome gas fireplace, bathroom with heated floors, toaster oven, microwave. No stove, but everything we needed for our short stay. Only downside is that if it's wet or muddy, the long driveway might be an issue, but our Prius V managed on it anyway. It is in a woodsy location, so best to arrive during daylight if possible. 25 minute drive to Kirkwood via Carson pass, if there's a possibility of a snow storm, you definitely need to make sure you have chains and know how to use them.

This is the perfect get-away, situated close to Hope Valley, Tahoe, and the Carson Valley while still being private and secluded. The cottage was beautifully appointed and had everything you could need. Comfortable beds and lots of room in the upstairs loft. Mike was responsive and helpful. Can't wait to come back and see it in all the other seasons of the year!
Beautiful cabin in a beautiful location. Warm and cozy during a winter storm, great selection of board games, and larger than the pictures show. Quick drive to Kirkwood or Tahoe.

Our stay at the cottage exceed our expectations. We felt safe, welcomed, and comfortable. Everything was clean and ready for us to feel right at home. The surrounding area is breathtaking. We will absolutely be returning, ready to make more memories!

We had a great stay (Dad with two teenage kids). Beautiful location with a very cozy cottage. Lots of games at the house. Couches and beds were really comfy. The kitchenette had enough supplies to make some basic meals. The cottage is in a beautiful canyon and we went on many walks through the snow, and the kids gad fun building snow forts. We also went skiing at Kirkwood, which was about a 25 minute drive away. Overall a beautiful, cozy place to spend New Years!

We had a lovely stay. Mike is a thoughtful host and very responsive. The location is great. There are beautiful aspen trees and a couple of nice creeks on the property. The cottage had everything we needed and it was very clean. The bed was comfortable. The heater/ fireplace worked well. We will definitely be back. Thank you!

Beautiful area, gorgeous cottage. Spacious feel, very clean, comfortable beds, thoughtful touches. Communicative host. Kitchen best for light cooking which leaves more time for exploring the area anyway. We could hear the highway a bit but that’s the nature of the canyon landscape here. It did not take away from the feeling of tranquility. We loved it!
great place! I highly recommend staying here!
We loved our stay at the cottage -- clean, comfortable, and in a beautiful location. Hoping we can go again sometime in a different season. Crazy about the aspen all around!!
What a wonderful place, we had an amazing relaxing weekend. Everything is a described, and even better than described.

Mike’s cottage is situated on the banks of the Carson River next to Woodfords and just north of downtown Markleeville. It is well appointed and in excellent condition. It is very cozy and adequate for 2-4 people. Mike is very responsive and got back to us on requests/questions promptly.

a gorgeous spot, very private and comfortable. great mattress, good shower; what else could you want?
There is limited kitchen space and spotty wi-fi, not crucial to us but may be to others.
Property is wonderful. Mike is a very accommodating host. You will not be disappointed.
A great place, exactly as pictured. We had a very nice stay and would love to come back again.
Fantastic stay! A get-away from it all, yet so close to kirkwood for a day a skiing.
What a great property. I stayed for the month of February and feel sad leaving. The property is very well equipped and was very clean.

The Cottage: Super cozy, nicer and more spacious and comfy than it looks in the listing pictures. The view all around is so pretty too!
The Location: Just 25 minutes from Kirkwood and South Lake Tahoe. Markleeville is about ten minutes away and has a brewery (Cutthroat IPA is delicious) and little eateries.
The Host: Mike is super quick with his responses, very kind and considerate and just all-round such a pleasure to book with.
We LOVED our stay and will definitely be back!
Mike was a generous host!

Mike's place is absolutely charming. The house is in a lovely setting, surrounded by trees and next to a little river. We had a blast building snowmen and sledding on a little hill just next to. It's 25min drive from Kirkwood where we skied.
The house itself is very well equipped, comfortable and simply beautiful inside.
The kitchen is rather small but we managed to cook our simple dinners without problems. Beds are really comfy.
We had to leave one day before because of the snowstorm coming and we had problems getting out of the little driveway - our 2 wheel drive Mazda with chains got sucked in the snow. But Mike was very quick to react and the plow came almost immediately to clear the way. If you have winter tires or a 4x4 you won't have any problems.
The communication with Mike was very pleasant and very quick. We wish we could have stayed longer in this beautiful place.
This home was a perfect for our family weekend getaway. Beautiful location next to the creek and a comfortable, well thought out cabin with everything we needed. We hope to be back soon.

This place was wonderful. very secluded, which is what I like. I was able to drive and see lake tahoe, Truckee, Virginia city and Gardnerville in a day and make it back by 5pm after spending hours touring.
Hope Valley is a delightful home base for your trip to Tahoe! This tasteful cabin and peaceful setting are simply lovely. Thank you, Mike!

This is a fantastic home. It's a large cottage with a lovely loft plus big bedroom. It has everything you need. Every detail has been thought through. The location is private and gorgeous. You can hear the river from the house. Highly recommend staying here.
This property is simply amazing!! Very spacious and comfortable with a location that was perfect for our fishing trip.

A wonderful private getaway with all the amenities and comfy (huge) bed. Clean, conveniently located, private, and secluded. Being so (conveniently) close to the road, we did hear cars over the babbling brook, but we imagine that varies depending on the season. All in all, we highly recommend!

Cute little stay on the river. Perfect for our family of five. Location was outstanding and cottage was very clean. Mike was a friendly host and responded to my questions promptly. We would definitely stay here again.

Pros: The cottage was easy to find, check in was easy and the river was in the backyard as described. It is close enough to Minden/Gardnerviile for groceries and lunch (go to Francisco's) and Blue Lake Rd where all our favorite painting spots are located. There was some noise from Hwy 88 although it was hard to distinguish it from the sound of the river rushing by. Otherwise it was very quiet at the end of a dirt road. There wasn't anyone occupying the house next door the entire week.
The cottage itself was very clean with many nice amenities and decor. The beds were comfortable too. Communication with Mike was great. He readily answered questions and even provided a DVD player at our request.
Cons: We found the one lightbulb in the kitchen insufficient for cooking with ease, the microwave making strange noises (so we were afraid to use it) and there was not enough light in the living room to read at night.

We had a pleasant and restful week.
Very comfortable and relaxing cottage. Beautiful location.
Awesome place, very clean (which is appreciated during COVID) and he has everything you may need, like plates, utensils, appliances (coffee and toaster oven, etc). Overall wonderful experience!

Excellent, spacious cottage near Kirkwood. We loved the loft for the kids and the master bedroom was luxurious. The bed was so comfortable. The view of the mountains was spectacular. I highly recommend this rental!
Our second time here! We love this cute cottage. It’s sparkling clean, has great amenities and the location is breathtaking! Thanks for a great stay!

The cottage was sparkling clean, very comfortable, bigger than we expected, and had everything we needed. The gas fireplace works really well and made the place very cozy for our winter visit. They've put a lot of effort into making sure everything necessary is in place, with instructions, and even labels on light switches. Very nice.

A hidden gem! You have to stay here! The location is beautiful and made for an excellent couple getaway trip for my fiancé and I! We celebrated our 5 year anniversary at Mike’s place and it couldn’t have been anymore amazing! I thought it might be weird staying in someone’s guest house. But not at all! So much privacy! We will definitely be coming back!
Very well situated cabin. Right in the center on valley under the blanket of fresh snow. The location is absolutely beautiful. It is little away from central crowded South Lake Tahoe which is a plus.

What a gem of a place! Came for a quick weekend trip to ski at Kirkwood. We loved how cozy and clean the place was. Plenty of room for the two of us to spread out. Loved having the full fridge and hot plates! Lots of thoughtful touches, cozy blankets, the Bose Bluetooth player, all the kitchen items, fire and nice big bed! Thanks for a great stay! Hope we can come back soon!
Perfect Sierra cabin retreat, cozy comfortable well appointed. Upstairs sleeping loft is wonderful for kids lots of games , game table and couch. Very relaxing place.
Very spacious and well equipped cottage in a super nice remote spot near a small creek! Enjoyed a lot with family of 4, two adults and 2 kids
Great place in the quiet Tahoe wilderness...exactly as described, clean, cozy and all amenities needed for our ski trip! Highly recommend.

Mike's place is tucked away from civilization. Huge, spacious, and very peaceful. It's close to major attractions. The main house is located next door but you still have your own backyard and privacy. We loved and enjoyed our stay. Definitely in our revisit list.
Thank you Mike. We had such a great time. We loved the mnt views, playing by the river, the coziness of the cabin, and the proximity to great skiing and sledding. Looking forward to coming back.

Great location- quiet and close to lots of nice outdoor activities. Description of the property is spot on. It was appreciated that the house is stocked: hairdryer; spices; coffee; and shampoo etc. It is a kitchenette. You can not roast a turkey but you we cooked great meals with the appliances on hand. The items in the kitchen are thoughtfully curated. Owner was very friendly and communicated well.
The cottage was very comfortable, and the setting amongst the aspens and close to the river was lovely. Great location with very convenient access to both wilderness and nearby towns.

This place is a gem! It is conveniently located off highway 88 with lots of hiking trails within 10 minutes drive. The cottage is on a big land with beautiful landscapes, mountain in the background, aspen trees, and apple trees. There is a creek only a few steps from the backyard door. There is a house next to the cottage but you still have plenty of space and privacy for the cottage itself. Rooms are clean, beds are comfortable and kitchenette is fully stocked. There is no washer dryer in the cottage though. At night the stars and Milky Way above are AMAZING! If you open the window a bit you could sleep hearing the sound of the river.
Mike is a great host with quick responses to questions.
We are a family of four with preschoolers. My kids had so much fun playing by the river, exploring the space, playing a family game upstairs and gazing at the stars. We will definitely be back!

Mike's place is awesome. The site is not only a perfect location for our traditional Fall drive exploration, the cottage was immaculate, felt like (better than) home, was peaceful, had beautiful design touches, had everything we needed in order to cook, sleep, read, relax. Mike was lovely, easy to communicate with.
Nice little cabin in the mountains, with beautiful view and nearby river.
Great location and very comfortable cottage with loft.
Fun, clean and quiet place:)
This spot is a gem! We really enjoyed our stay.
Wonderful home in a beautiful location. Mike was a great host and we wanted for nothing.

Comfortable cabin on the West Fork of the Carson River. Loved sitting outside next to the river morning and evening. The cabin itself was great for my family of 3. Our daughter loved the loft and skylights for looking at stars. Great stay.
The cottage was a great place to stay! It was very clean and comfortable, and had much of what you need. My kids loved the loft. We would definitely come back here again!
Mike's cottage is a perfect place for a ski weekend at Kirkwood. The drive is about 20 minutes and is beautiful and easy. The place is very comfortable and bigger than it looks online.

My husband and I had a lovely getaway weekend here. The river is right out the back door and you can hear it when you open the windows. All the instructions where very clear which was super helpful because there is no cell service on your way in. Once there it was easy to connect to wi-fi so we could still be connected if we needed to. The cottage is very cozy and comfortable and just a pleasure to hang out in.
Better than what you'd expect. Perfect getaway cottage. I highly recommend it!

We just got back from 4 nights at Mike’s place. We loved how close it is to Kirkwood. We were happily surprised at the size of the cabin. From the outside it looks smaller than it is - my husband and I had our own room and there is a loft space with two beds.The heat from the fireplace heated the living room and loft space. Mike provided many board games in the loft space which we enjoyed playing. The living room has a very comfortable couch with blankets available for those cold nights. There is no stove/oven but there is a toaster oven, microwave and 2 electric plug in heating. Everything was well labeled. Clear instructions for check out. Complimentary shampoo, conditioner, soap, lots of towels, and coffee. Highly recommend for a family with 1 or 2 kids.
Communication was quick and efficient. The cottage was pretty and amenities were as described in the listing.

Mike's beautiful property is tucked away, providing a lot of privacy. The best parts: The West Fork Carson River runs THROUGH their property (!!) and the stars we saw each nights was better than any planetarium.
Mike was very responsive in our correspondences and provided a lot of information about the house and how to get there in advance.
Highly recommended!

This is the most adorable cottage in the perfect setting. Just the perfect place to get away and disconnect from the hustle and bustle of day to day life.
Cottage and super clean and has all the necessities (even more) for a getaway. Mike was a great and very responsive host. We will definitely return.
Great location, nice views from deck, well appointed with many kitchen amenities, spacious rooms. Host was responsive and easy to communicate with.

Beautiful location!
We truly enjoyed ourselves, it is very cozy. Great bedding, comfortable stay. Be aware that this is a cabin - Small shower, no table to eat at, hand wash dishes. It is also positioned next to a house- so there may be other guests about.

Mike's place is great for a family trip away from "city" distractions! We played board games (many are provided in the cottage) and had adventures by the river in the backyard! Great place to connect as a family. It's location is great in regards to pools, hot springs, and hiking!

Mike's house is much better than expected. It's even much better than what's in the photo (since we went during summer time). Everything was great and we couldn't ask more for our weekend stay in Tahoe
Awesome place to stay, tucked away 30-40 minutes from south lake depending on conditions. Very clean and host is very nice.

The home exceeded our expectations- it was well stocked with pots, pans, and hot plates (3 burners!). Beds were comfy, fire place was terrific, and proximity to the creek was terrific. Could hear the river from the bedroom! Mike’s communication and supporting check-in info (in the book) was terrific. Really pleased with the value too. We plan to return!!
Perfect location for a mountain escape!

We enjoyed the cottage, it really was comfortable. Nice amenities, great to have the towels, soap, toilet paper, etc. The beds were warm with flannel sheets and very comfortable. We stayed with our two adult children and there was plenty of room. The kitchen was fine without the oven, we cooked on the stove top. It wasn't hard to find the place once you had the directions. It is about 20 minutes away from Kirkwood.

You will fall in love with this cottage! It is in a magnificently beautiful setting and the accommodations are so comfortable and cozy! We snuggled down Thanksgiving morning when we awake to new fallen snow. You will love your stay here! Thanks Mike!
Great host. Nice house. Close to some of the incredible beauty of the Sierras.

Mike was one of the most responsive and accommodating Airbnb hosts ever. The place was right on the rushing Carson river and the views were incredible. Be sure to have dinner at Stonefly in Markleeville!

This listing perfect for people skiing at Kirkwood. It's about 30 mins drive. The check-in instructions from Mike was clear and helpful. Do read it before you lose your cellular signal. Otherwise it might be hard for you to find the listing. One thing to call out is the restrooms - it is very good and newly remodeled.

We loved staying at the cottage. It was very scenic, surrounded by mountains and you can hear the river from inside the house.
We drove to Kirkwood for snowboarding. It's about a 30 min drive (and I imagine it would be longer when there's actually snow on the ground), but staying at the spacious and cozy cottage after a fun day was lovely.
We loved eating at nearby Stonefly. There isn't a proper stovetop in the kitchen, so guests should be prepared to eat out.
Great place to stay! Very scenic right by the river. Easy to get to, just wished we stayed longer!

Mike's cottage is perfect for a couple, or a family (adults and kids). It actually felt larger than it looked from the pictures. The kitchen was well equipped and we cooked a lot even with just the two burner cooktop. The bathroom was nice with heated floor (wonderful on a cold winter morning). Beds wer comfortable with lovely linens.
Lots of board games and a wonderfully soft rug in the sitting area. We think it would be amazing to come back in the fall when the aspen turn color.
Restaurant recommendation: Stonefly in Markleeville. Amazing food and ambiance.
We will definitely remember this place.

We had a wonderful stay at this charming cottage. The inside was nicely decorated and very clean, make us feel like home away from home the minutes we walked in. The setting is perfect... back to the river and the mountain. We will be thrilled to come back again!

Awesome, well set up cottage a few miles out of Markleeville. Incredible views from the home and property and was perfect for a weekend up there. The house is very well set up with all the basics you'll require for your stay. Thanks, Mike, for the such a great AirBnB experience!

Really lovely cabin that is very well maintained and taken care of. We really enjoyed our weekend stay here and we had a blast. We walked around the property and went for a small picnic nearby and saw the sunset and sunrise. We felt comfortable and had everything we needed! We ate dinner at Sorensens Resort one night which was only a few miles down the road. Kirkwood is about 30 mins and Cross country about 10 mins drive. We really loved spending time here and would love to come back again!

Wonderful cabin! We were looking for a quiet, scenic place to spend the weekend, and this did not disappoint. Very clean and comfortable, and though it is in a secluded area that is off the beaten path it was perfect for what we wanted. The river and mountains on either side of the cabin are incredible, and the cabin itself is located in a perfect spot for skiing at Kirkwood or just hiking around that area. Didn't get much chance to explore the immediate area, but bet in the summer it will be fantastic.

An ideal location to get away! Cozy and comfortable. We were there during bad weather and were delighted to hang in front of the fire. Don't plan for elaborate cooking as the kitchen is tight and does not have an oven. But there are charming places nearby for dining.
And the bed is VERY comfy!
Thanks Mike!

Mike's cottage is in a georgeous secluded location. The architecture and interior design are clean and modern. The bedding and linens were top notch and I felt as if much care was taken to create a great experience for guests. Everything was new and sparkling clean. The kitchen was well appointed. Families should know that there is a shower not a tub, the stove is a two burner portable stove that sits on the counter top, and there is only seating for two at a bar for eating. We are a family of four and we were perfectly happy cooking, eating, and playing Mike's extensive collection of board games in this charming space. The decor is modern cabin chic with beautiful textures, neutral colors, and a cohesive design. You can't imagine how soft the area rug and throw blankets are in the living room. The fireplace is the main source of heat and is very cozy. Behind the cottage is a creek that you can see from the house. The host was easy to work with, highly responsive, and kind. I highly recommend this property.
Me and my friends had a great and comfortable stay at Burt’s property.

Super cute place. love the front yard so much. Right in town but feels very private. Hot tub was so nice on the chilly nights to soothe the muscles after hiking around the hot springs just down the road. If you want an amazing dinner, the restaurant two doors down will not disappoint. The Stone Fly was the name. The general store next door has a good variety albeit small grocery selection.
The cabin is very nicely insulated from the outside noise. Great kitchen appliances with most everything you need to cook meals. The space is really efficiently used. Loved the place and highly recommend it.
Great place to stay. Within walking distance to some very great restaurants, especially the Stonefly. We enjoyed the hot tub and our dogs enjoyed the yard. We would definitely stay there again.

Burt's place was fantastic! It's right next to a wonderful little grocery store and two great restaurants, and just down the road from the Grover Hot Springs. The hot tub was wonderful to relax in and the kitchen is very nice. We had a great time and are looking forward to coming back soon!

Awesome place in the heart of downtown. Tons of character. Hot Tub and beautiful kitchen appliances were highlights. Yard area was fenced off and super private. Short walk to some great dining options.
A great location in Merkleeville; right on the main road with easy walking to restaurants and not far from Kirkwood and other South Lake Tahoe locations.
Good location. Responsive host. Would stay again.

This place, and our amicable host Burt are true CA GEMS.
We stayed here for quick access to Kirkwood and the surrounding area and our expectations were completely blown away.
The house is cozy as hell, surrounded by a beautiful, dog friendly yard and the hot tub was just pitch perfect.
The place couldn’t be better situated in the quaint town of Markleeville, literally right between a delicious restaurant called Stone Fly and a well-stocked general store. Beyond retreat.

We stayed at Burt’s cabin for 4 nights and it was absolutely wonderful. The cabin was easy to find, spotless, well-stocked, and super cozy. The kitchen was the best stocked Airbnb kitchen I’ve ever seen! Tons of pots and pans, everything we needed to cook dinner each night. Also just a note that older reviews mention there only being one bathroom, but there is a half bath downstairs. The hot tub was fabulous and the yard was private and great for the kids to play. Burt was incredibly helpful and responsive leading up to our trip. The neighborhood is super cute. We loved taking walks, popping into the general store, and having beers at the brewery across the street. Thanks Burt! We will be back.
Amazing stay here . Great location and always feels like home.

Second time at Burt’s place . I am glad to say we made a second trip back loved it so much such a cozy stay , I LOVE the bed sheets so much I was looking forward to they stay in the bed , thank you hurt for the stay , can’t wait to be back again such a perfect little home away from home 🏠 definitely one off the cleanest places I’ve stayed at
Fab little house. Perfect for our weekend. We were skiing in Kirkwood and it was infinitely better than staying at Kirkwood itself. Love Markleyville.

The home was very cozy and warm. The jacuzzi was very comfortable and the surroundings were beautiful. We enjoyed our evenings in the jacuzzi. The only complaint we had was the house was a bit rustic and outdated. Opening the doors was rough at night because they were very loud and would wake everyone up. There was not much space in bedrooms to store our items because the drawers were filled with towels and linens. The overall experience was pleasant, however we would have appreciated if the check out was a little later. 10am seems too early when other homes and hotels allow for a later checkout. We tried to contact the host but did not get a response.

Burt's place is comfortable and cozy for up to 4 people, has a great fenced yard for dogs, hot tub, and great location in Markleeville. House was very clean. Parking convenient in front of the house. Wonderful place and area to stay.

Really sweet house in a great location. Very comfortable for my family. We loved the hot tub. And great little library in Markleeville! They gave me a temporary library card so we were able to borrow books.

Burt’s place was beyond beautiful! The house was so nice , felt right at home ! I’m glad we went when we did the weather was beautiful, woke up to a blanket of snow everywhere outside the town was cute , the bed was comfortable, probably my favorite thing in the house lol. I can’t wait to come back again it was such a delightful stay, the stay was perfect.
Secluded while feeling safe and comfortable. The scenery was stunning and the cabin was spotless. The cherry on top was the jacuzzi and backyard beneath the trees and stars.

My husband and I loved this little cabin. It was so welcoming walking into the outside lights along the fence on a cold night. The inside was very clean along with all the kitchen appliances and cookware. Very organized home and we would love to come again. The only thing we found different from other airbnbs is that there were no board games, we usually bring our own but we had to work the day of arrival and were in a rush. With that being said, many of our games we've purchased are due to other airbnbs. But the stay was still amazing, there is wifi and streaming apps and the jacuzzi was so relaxing . Our German shepherd also had a great time!

Amazing place to stay for a couple nights to hike! The kitchen had everything you could ask for, and the TV was set for any streaming service which was perfect for a movie night.
Everything was squeaky clean, and the setting was super cozy between the wood stove, big bedroom, and roomy living room.
Can’t recommend enough!

Great location. Right next door to the best restaurant, Stonefly. Make sure to make reservations for dinner. Great kitchen. Could make a thanksgiving feast there. Charming and cozy. Great yard for our dogs.

We have been to Burt's Place numerous times. It is the only place we will stay in Markleeville .We loveBurt's because it is well stocked, clean, and very relaxing. Burtis also a very responsive host. We love Burt because he always takes good care of us. We'll be back.
great place!
Great relaxing place! And so close to fishing!
Great cabin close to restaurants and a market, easy location for hiking and exploring. Lovely fenced in backyard. Would definitely stay again!

What a great place to stay right in downtown Markleeville! You can walk through town to various attractions such as the historic museum and school, Cutthroat tavern, Stonefly restaurant, and if you prefer to cook but didn’t plan to bring food with you, is right next door to the Markleeville General Store. The cabin is perfectly set up with everything you need, and yet is minimal and clean. The beds are fantastic and cozy and you will sleep well. The outdoor space is charming and relaxing, although tucked right in amongst the busy downtown area it has the feel of being more remote and is surprisingly quiet. We really enjoyed our stay as a family, and we’re able to make our annual visit to my great grandfather’s high Sierra cowboy camp just up Ebbetts pass and hike the PCT. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay, we will most definitely be back again!

Hi everyone,
This place was really amazing, felt home. It was super clean and we really enjoyed the jacuzzi… The house was peaceful and serene and we would love to visit again. Highly recommend this place.
Thank you Burt for everything.

This place is a gem! Has everything you could possibly desire. The pictures do not lie!
We travel often with our two dogs. Usually, we have to pick and choose what amenities are more important to us, because very rarely does a house have everything on our checklist. But this house, has everything!
Fully equipped kitchen with HIGH QUALITY appliances. Anyone who gets down in the kitchen can truly appreciate what it has to offer.
Comfy, plush beds and couch.
Good sized backyard for pets and/or kids, which includes a beautiful full size spa.
40 mins outside of South Lake Tahoe. For us, it’s perfectly located. The town is slow, quiet, and serene. Close enough for a day trip to Tahoe, (which includes a beautiful drive, with views you wouldn’t believe).
The host was extremely responsive and friendly.
Only thing I’d recommend is making sure you grab some groceries before you get there! The town closes up early on weekdays.
Don’t be like us. Plan ahead! :)
Very nice place in a wonderful place.
Great place to take my son fishing, we would love to stay at Burt’s again.

Spic and span! Every detail thought of… Super comfy beds with soft white linens, fluffy pillows and duvet.
Plenty of everything - towels and extra sheets (to snooze on the plush couch).
Quiet, peaceful - we loved relaxing on the patio, looking at the stars, listening to the creek and forest, and enjoying a good glass of wine. The garden is charming… with a lilac that reminded me of my mom’s garden in Tahoe.
We made great meals thanks to the fully-appointed (chef quality) kitchen - full size fridge and 6-burner stove. (New appliances.) The dishwasher, washer and dryer made it extra nice. My husband appreciated that the knives were good and sharp.
It’s literally in the middle of (the tiny) historic downtown, near the general store (ice cream sandwiches!) and good dining options in every price range.
Beware that the bathtub has a high side which took some maneuvering, and brighter folks will figure out the remote controls faster than I.
We loved it and would love to come back.
Loads of gratitude to the hosts.

Another wonderful annual vacation thanks to Burt and his awesome place.
From the wonderful upgrade of the hot tub and various additions to the inside of the cabin since we last visited, to the tranquil private deck and the kindness Burt always shows us, we had another wonderful stay. Also, can’t beat being that close to our favorite restaurant of all time: StoneFly. And the close vicinity to the stunning jewels Ebbetts Pass and the surrounding Sierra’s has to offer is beyond worth it. Looking forward to next year. Thanks again so much, Burt!
Great place to stay. No A/C but lots of fans that helped keep it cool. Really cute town and the yard was nice and private.

Burt's home in the center of Markleeville's is private, comfortable and very relaxing. We particularly enjoyed the well-appointed kitchen and lovely outdoor deck. It was such a plus that we could bring our dog on this trip!

My husband and I have been here many times. We love Burt's Place. Every time we visit, Burt has made some kind of improvement. This visit we found that he had added a half bath downstairs (a huge plus) , a brand new and larger hot tub, and a new wifi that allowed me to make calls and texts on my cell. We love that we get to bring our dogs along. Burt is a superhost and very responsive.
This was the cutest cabin! Everything was perfect and the hot tub in the desk with a full moon was perfect!

This cute little cottage was the perfect place to spend my wife’s birthday with our 3 kids. It’s a great home base for surrounding activities and it’s tastefully decorated, has all the necessities plus a jacuzzi hot tub, and boasts a cozy loft-like upper bedroom with a cabin feel that we all ended up fighting over. Burt was very communicative and it’s obvious he takes pride in this rental. However, we were caught off guard by the not-so-clean bedding. There were several hairs (maybe animal?) in the sheets and after pulling down the top sheet to possibly sleep on top of it, we found even more hair which forced us to take off the bedding completely. Luckily, there were several more sets of extra sheets and we had brought our own blankets anyway. My wife is a stickler for cleanliness so she was not impressed but we were able to make it work. Overall, we had a great trip.
Great stay!

Loved the cabin. Located right next to a general store and a brewery, it’s in a great location.
The kitchen had every tool you could need, and the fridge had some essentials like mayo and ketchup. Brand new oven and dishwasher.
The hot tub was wonderful! There were tons of towels which came in handy. The beds were super comfortable.
Our only negative was that the gas company had forgotten to replenish the propane, so we had no heat, no hot water, and a non working oven and stove which wasn’t great, especially on Thanksgiving day. However, the owner was super responsive and got the gas company to come in two hours.

This was our second stay at Burt's cabin. The hot tub is phenomenal on a cold winter day. Markleeville is beautiful, and the pub across the street Cutthroat is really fun. Lovely stargazing as well. Everything we wanted to get away and relax for a weekend

Cozy cabin in excellent location- not too far from Hope Valley and Grover hot springs. The beds were super comfortable, there’s lots of space in the kitchen with new appliances, a lovely outdoor hot tub, and we really appreciated the laundry facilities too!
This is a great place to stay and was as described in the posting. The kitchen has great appliances and everything was very clean.

Burt's Place in a jewel! This is our 6 or 7th stay. Obviously we love this place. Burt has been making some really nice upgrades since our last stay in May. Always love our visit to this house. Especially love that our furbabies get to join us.
great house and location, easy communication and access
Wonderful location in our favorite town of Markleeville. Loved the outdoor deck with hot tub and cozy living room and kitchen. The high-end appliances were a huge plus! We’ll be back!!
Excellent place to stay and clean.
Great experience

If Markleeville is where you want to be, this is a great spot. Its a cute small town and this place is right between the general store and the best restaurant in town and directly across the street from the nice tavern restaurant in town. There is a fully functional kitchen with all the items you need to be self-sufficient if you want that and washer and dryer to do laundry if needed. The giant TV in the upstairs bedroom is a theater experience. Note there is not AC in the place so depending time of year, it can get a little warm. There are lots of fans and since it cools off at night and the house is shaded by big trees, even in the hottest days of summer, closing windows in the morning keeps the place quite cool all day. Nice patio to hang out on with hot tub. And if you do have any issue, the host is super responsive. Rent this place with confidence.
We had a very comfortable stay in your markleeville home - thank you for your hospitality.

This well-appointed house in an amazing location was perfect for our cycling trip to Markleeville. The beds and linens were super comfy, and we enjoyed the hot tub after a long bike ride. We even got to enjoy a nice dinner out at the restaurant two doors down. I would definitely stay here again and hopefully for longer next time.

Excellent location! High quality utensils, excellent hot tub and B-B-Que. Burt was very responsive to questions we had. The only caveat is if you have trouble with stairs, that's the only way to the bathroom. Otherwise, top-notch!

This is the place to stay while in Alpine County! As others have mentioned, fantastic location, super comfy beds and bedding, very clean and a host that is the perfect balance of being relaxed and welcoming, while attentive to anything you should need. The deck and hot tub were top notch - we throughly enjoyed the peace and quiet under the stars. We’ll be back for all of the above, plus the fishing, great food, and proximity to the Carson City hot springs, which was a lot of fun. Book and enjoy!

Burt's place is lovely. This was our 5th stay. Comfy beds, wonderful spacious deck with hot tub, and great fenced yard for our dogs. There are several delicious restaurants just a few doors away. Burt is VERY GOOD about responding to you quickly.

Burt’s place is cozy and the perfect weekend getaway! You can’t beat the location - right in the middle of a small. amazing town. The beds are very comfortable and the cottage had everything we needed for a pleasant stay.
Burt was a gracious host! Home was next to everything you need in town.
Right in the center town near restaurants. Wifi is great. Burt the host is very nice and accommodating! Great place to stay! Cozy

Great space for a family. Super comfy living room area. Beds are warm and comfortable. Loved how we were able to walk across the street to Cutthroat's for some yummy beer and food. Easy drive to Kirkwood. Lots of great hikes nearby. Sad to see so much destruction from the fires, but glad to see this tiny town made it through!

Great spot for a getaway for two. Cozy retreat for peace and quiet. Winter hours for the restaurants were limited. Plan ahead. Summer time is probably better. I would go back for another visit in the future.
The house is perfect for two people.

We had a great time in Markleeville during winter season. Great places to eat!! The General store next door opens in April 2022, as it has been under repair from the fires. It was a cute little house and great to have the hot tub. The heater was perfectly fine and warmed the house. We do pay $100 per guest to cover a cleaner, so I was surprised the stove was greasy, and the bathroom floor and rug were not clean. Everything else was fine. It’s a great location with 30 min to Kirkwood, skiing, and 45 min to Carson city Hot springs. Recommend to stay here.
Great cozy little place in a great little town!! Definitely coming back!!!!

Lovely and cozy stay with a really good restaurant right across the street! Burt had tons of kitchen utensils which was super useful since we brought groceries to cook with us. The hot tub was also a great bonus.
This place is so cute - would love to stay here again next time we are in town

We spent three nice in the Cozy Cabin in Markleeville in winter.
It’s well equipped and the hot tub did wonders after two days’ skiing in nearby Kirkwood and Heavenly. The two king beds let us wake rested for the next day’s adventure.
Would consider staying here again!
It is a small house but it has everything we need!

Thanks to record-breaking snow storms, all the roads were closed to get to Burt’s place during the time of our reservation. Burt was super accommodating and refunded us the amount we had paid. We hope we can get there someday!

Great location, great place. Burt is very good in communication. Loved using the hot tub in winter. Carry body wash/soap and shampoo with you. I recommend this place to everyone looking to ski near lake tahoe.
Cozy house in a friendly little town.
We’ve stayed at Burt’s for a few years now, and it’s definitely our home away from home. Can’t wait to come back next year. Thank u for everything Burt
Great place to chill out for a few days. Super quiet and the stars look beautiful. I recommend this to anyone that needs a weekend away from a busy schedule.
Burt’s place is really cozy and comfortable. He is also very responsive and helped us out when we had some issues. A nice cafe and pub nearby and lots of privacy.

Beautiful, cozy cabin in a super convienient location - everything else in Markleeville was just a few steps away! The jacuzzi was everything we'd hoped for, and the surrounding roads & trails were absolutely gorgeous. Never been to Markleeville before, but now I definitely want tk go back. Thanks to Burt for the nice place & being a helpful host!
Such a cozy comfortable place! Love the atmosphere and energy! The Cutthroat has amazing food with great outdoor seating area. Definitely will do it again!

We were in the area for a wedding. Great location in the middle of a sweet, peaceful, lazy little town. The bar and restaurant are just steps away. The general store is right next door but happened to be closed while we were there. The deck, outside seating, jacuzzi, and fenced in yard are really nice. The house was clean, spacious, and very comfortable for the 5 of us. Sharing an upstairs bathroom may be challenging for some but we're used to that. Beds and couch were big and very comfy. Communicating with Burt and check in was really easy.
Overall a good experience. I would note the only bathroom is on the second floor off of the second bedroom.
Great place
Markleeville is a really sweet place to stay! And the house was comfortable, the beds were heavenly, the hot tub was super clean! There was some really cool decor too :)
Great place right in the middle of Markleeville, which is a cool little town. Short walk to everything and good Basecamp for exploring the area.

Our second year in a row and this little gem in high Sierra country has officially become a yearly ritual!
30-second walk from one of the best restaurants in California in my foodie opinion, Stonefly, Burt’s is the perfect pairing of privacy, convience and relaxation in the pristine nature of the Sierra’s.
This year, unfortunately, the hot tub was being repaired during our stay so we didn’t get our nightly soak under the stars. Burt did a good job of handling it though & even refund one of our nights for the unexpected disappointment.
We still enjoyed having our own private deck for yoga & star gazing and loved the down town store, live music over the weekend and of courses the proximity to the wilderness and forests of the Pass.
We look forward to our trip up again next summer!
Perfect getaway town close to Tahoe. Old house with lots of character, and new amenities. Town is very small and extremely quiet. Can’t wait to come back to this location.

The cabin was great! The kitchen was stocked with all the needed cooking utensils. The beds were comfortable and the hot tub was great for star gazing! They are not exaggerating when they say it is in the center of town! We would love to come back again.

Great place, great location! So close to Tahoe, Carson City and Reno! Not to mention the the local stuff to do, like Grover Springs! The town is small and the people are very friendly! The store owners next door have everything you need and are great to talk to! This place has everything you need for a comfortable stay!
Cute dog friendly home! The hot tub was perfect and our pup was a big fan of the backyard

Great house, location and value for money. House is right behind a wooden bench. Really cool neighborhood, with a cozy feel! The restaurant/ pub across the street ( cutthroat) had friendly hosts and great food and drinks! We picked food both nights and loved it! Highly Recommend this for a couple or a small family!

We stayed here for a close spot to the local hot springs but ended up really enjoying the town of Markleeville as well. Despite being on the main strip, this quiet town made us feel like we had plenty of privacy. All of the beds and furniture were super comfortable and there were plenty of extra towels if needed. It was clean, welcoming, and as it states, very cozy. We would definitely stay here again!

Great location in Markleeville! Perfect spot for me & my girlfriend to meet up & spend a few fun days snowboarding. Loved the fact that I could bring along my dogs. The hot tub was an added bonus after full days on the mountain it was perfect! Cant wait to book it again!

Burt was very kind and responsive.
House:

great place in a really fun little town.

Location is great! Sharpest knives I've ever used at an Airbnb. It wasn't as issue for us but the only bathroom is attached to the upstairs bedroom.
Great place to stay, clean, great hot tub for a family, however if you have two couples you have to share a bathroom which is inside of the upstairs bedroom.

We really enjoyed the jacuzzi and our dogs loved running around in the fenced yard! The nearby brewery had awesome food and the general store was nicely stocked. We loved the small town feel and being able to walk to everything. Quick drive to Tahoe.

The place was very cozy, the beds were super comfortable! The snow was melting so it was a little muddy but my fault for not checking the weather. The hot tub was amazing! It was already on and we didn’t have to worry about it (: there are plates and cups and pans and oven and dishwasher work! There are some spices and nothing in the kitchen so make sure you bring the groceries you need! There was extra blanket and even a room separator for the dogs, my dogs loved it! Thank you!
Great location, right next to a grocery store and gas station and about 30 mins drive from Kirkwood resort. The place is really clean and cozy, would definitely come back again!
House's location is right in the center of Downieville convenient to everything. The space is ample and the house is well stocked and clean. Yard is perfect for the dog. Hot tub rocks!

We enjoyed our stay at Burts place. Had everything we needed (just 2 of us!) and lots of room to spread out. Cutthroat Brewery right across the street had delicious food but we also cooked in the kitchen. Kitchen was well stocked with everything you need (always a blessing!). Thanks again!

We stayed here for 2 nights to adventure to Tahoe! It was the perfect place for my fiancé and I and our pup! The hot tub was a nice relaxing touch to a very cold weekend! We were very grateful the house was well stocked with all types of dishes and openers we needed for a successful weekend!
Side note* I would not recommend this place to anyone needing handicap accommodations because it was not shoveled with the snow and the only bathroom is on the second floor requiring walking up stairs.
Will definitely consider again in the future!

Burt’s place was such an amazing spot to get snowed into. We had access to all three ski mountains, plenty of larger markets, but most importantly the town of Markleeville had everything we needed. From the night we arrived until the day we left, J Marklee Toll Station was our saving grace. Once the blizzard hit we appreciated the hot tub more than ever, cozy loft lighting, and the delicious feast awaiting us across the way every night. Lots of love for the hot tub, dishwasher, big beds, and the great shower. Thank you so much Burt!
The place was very nice and spacious. Will be coming back!

My girlfriend, my two dogs, and I had a great time staying at Burt's place! The cabin was clean and cozy, with a fenced in back/front yard, a Jacuzzi, and working WiFi!
We did not have any issues, besides the town of Markleeville being barren, and Burt was always very quick to respond to any questions we had. Check-in / Check-out process was very smooth.
5 Stars all-around would recommend this place to travelers with dogs looking for somewhere to stay in the area!

We stayed in a Burt’s house for two days for New Years celebration. It was sparkling clean, comfortable, it also was bigger than we expected, which is great! The hot tub was absolutely amazing! The house had everything we needed and it made our holiday very special! Thank you so much, Burt! We will be back!
Nice tried this place is amazing

Outstanding communication and service by the host, cute little house in a cute little town.

This is our first time using Airbnb, we had a awesome first experience. Pass my expectations. Thank you Mr. Burt
Loved staying at Burt’s place! Perfect location.
great place and beautiful location.
