Great place for a getaway
Right in the center of town - easy to walk to local shops and restaurants.

We really enjoyed the place and it is conveniently located in town. Anything you need is right there 30 steps out of the gate... definitely coming back as we love the town, the food across the street at Cutthroat Brewery is Amazing and the house is warm and cozy, Burt answered immediately when i needed to ask him a question and was very respectful and helpful!
Love It
Right next to the local market, cafe, and brewery! Beautiful area and cozy atmosphere.

LOVE BURT'S PLACE AND BURT!! This was our 4th stay. It is as wonderful as our stays. We love that we can bring our dogs along. They now do a "happy dance" when we get inside. This place is always very clean. Burt is always FAST to respond to my questions. We'll be back.
Great little getaway. Right in the heart of Markleville. The hot tub was fantastic and even with being in the middle of town, very quiet. We wish we could have stayed longer.
Great place in a charming little town. Very well provisioned store next door. Loved the brew pub across the street.

The location and character of this cute spot can't be beat! Perfect for our fall colors getaway in a sleepy historical town. The only downside is the sole bathroom which is in the upstairs loft, however this is clearly communicated in the listing.
We had a wonderful stay enjoying the beautiful Autumn colors in the area. The home is in a great location in town. Home very comfy and well appointed.
Great location, comfortable accommodations and was everything I expected. Markleeville is a great mountain town, great outdoor activities. Thanks for a great stay Burt!

This was our third stay. WE LOVE THIS PLACE!! Burt is a great host and quick to respond to my questions. The house is always clean, well equipped, and very comfortable. The hot tub is always wonderful and set on a deck in a cute yard. We are always thankful to be able to take our dogs. We will be back!
Great value, location & host.

The owner Burt was great an easy to communicate with. The house was better then expected. All top of the line appliances an furnishing. Hot tub on the deck area was great! The local restaurants were friendly an great food too. Would highly recommend for a great mountain retreat.
Our second year staying at Burts! The house, location, everything was great! I’ll be back! Markleeville is wonderful.
What you would expect from a cabin and much much more. Fabulous space and great stylish touches. Perfect setting to relax and a decent distance from many great sights. Would highly recommend.
Nice place. The house is well equipped and the neighborhood is very quiet. Communication with the host was easy and helpful.

The place has the perfect location, right next to restaurants and a convenient grocery store. The house is clean and spacious with a big and beautiful yard, where my dog had a lot of fun. Strongly recommend if you plan to come to Lake Tahoe!
Great house in a perfect location.
Great place!

This cozy cabin was the perfect escape for families and dog owners alike. Markleeville is the cutest little place and the recreation nearby is awesome! Burt was responsive and kind, we were very high strung trying to find a place where we could self-evacuate from the nearby fires at our home. The weekend was exactly what my family needed, an idyllic escape, and the cabin made us feel at home. We cannot recommend it enough, although we kind of want to keep it a secret! But it’s too good not to share! Thank you, Burt!

10/10 would recommend. The place was clean and well equipped for a nice vacation into the Mountains. If you’re looking for a place that is closer to the hiking off Route 4 than South Lake Tahoe, this is a great spot.

What a sweet cabin in a beautiful little town full of nice people and nice hot springs and dinning.
The location is outstanding in the midst of it all.
You enter through a sweet yard and your eyes immediately linger on the sweet hot tub .
My family and I spent three nights there and we loved it .
I highly recommend a weekend at Burt’s house .

This is a great spot as a basecamp for exploring the Mokelumne Wilderness and Alpine County areas, conveniently located off Hwy 89 next door to the general store.
Simple and easy check in. Burt was a nice host, friendly and available for any questions.
Bed was clean and comfy, perfect for a good night’s rest after hiking in the mountains. Two bedrooms, both tidy and cosy with ample pillows and bedding.
Bathroom was clean and the downstairs bedroom cabinet was stocked with clean towels. Shower tub wall was high but simple for us to navigate in/out.
Kitchen was great for preparing our dinner with ample kitchen wares for cooking. There are a few cooking staples in the unit, but make sure to bring your favorite prep ingredients and seasonings. Hot tub was available to us, but we did not have the time to use it.
We wish we had more time to explore this area; we would highly recommend this listing and would book here again.
Really nice!
So homey and cute! There’s little dog memorabilia all around the house and yard, which we loved so much. Would stay there again 100%

This is a great house, nicely decorated, has all you will need including a hottub! Markleeville is a great little historic town close to many great outdoor recreation options. Just be aware only bathroom is upstairs.

The house was really great. It was spacious, the furniture was comfortable, and the hot tub was really fun to enjoy at night with all of the stars overhead. The small town vibe is perfect for those looking to escape the valley. Thanks for having us and we hope to stay again!
Fantastic value for a great location close to Lake Tahoe and so many hiking trails!!! The fully equipped kitchen made meal making a breeze!
The pictures don't do it justice! Burt's place was more spacious and lovely than we expected
Cute place in a small town. Amazing deal for a small family!
Very nice place. Super clean and cozy. Very comfortable beds. Will stay here again if we can.

We had a wonderful stay at this cozy cabin in Markleeville. It has an ideal location in the center of town, has a great set up if you want to bring your dogs, and the beds were extremely comfortable. Burt was also a great host and got back to us right away with any questions we had. Would recommend staying here!

Very comfortable. There isn't very good cell phone reception, so you will need the WiFi. If the one in the app doesn't work, once you walk in look on the small dividing wall between the entrance and the dining area.
Loved staying here. So cozy, felt relaxed and at home. Delicious food right next door, hot springs a very short drive away, and a sweet little space to base adventures out of. LOVED it here.
I can’t recommend this place enough. Perfect in every way. We can’t wait to book again.
Burt was quick to answer my questions before I confirmed my booking. Place was great and we had a lovely time!
Nice, clean place. We enjoyed the rustic feel. The photos are a good representation of the place.
So awesome! Unbeatable location- totally stocked with everything you need. Fenced in yard is awesome and private- we left our pup behind this trip but would surely bring her along next time.
Clean, spacious, hot tub clean and hot! Loved it!

This is a little oasis in the middle of Markleeville! We had a wonderful time. We really appreciated the simplicity and functionality of the house. The kitchen is fully equipped and even has sharp knives, which is really nice too. We'll definitely come back again!
Great cabin, perfect for pups! Lovely little homey touches and amenities. Burt was very responsive. Thanks for a great stay!
We loved Burt's place. Great location and very comfortable and relaxing. Cute town close to everything!! We also enjoyed the hot tub
A wonderful place to escape from busy life.
Super nice place out in the woods

Nice place to get away from it all in the winter. We enjoyed the hot tub, our dog loved the yard, and the bed was incredibly comfortable. Great location on Main Street Markleeville with restaurant, deli and saloon within the same block. Close to Grover Hot Springs. Only 1 bathroom upstairs could be an issue for some.
Cozy and well equipped in downtown Markleeville! We were grateful to be able to bring our dog and everything was very clean! Hot tub is fantastic!

Burt’s place was such a wonderful spot for a relaxing trip. We picked up what we needed from the General Store right next door and could relax in the hot tub or on the very comfy couch. Kitchen was great for preparing lunches for days out skiing in nearby Hope Valley. The place was also the shortest walk possible to breakfast at Alps Haus Cafe and dinner at Stonefly, which made for a perfect weekend!

We were a party of three and stayed here for 2 nights. Went here for XC skiing in Hope Valley and Grover Hot Springs. The house is in the center Markleeville next to a grocery store and near a couple of restaurants.
We had a really great stay at this property. The house was very clean. There were two smart TV sets in the house and the Wi-Fi was pretty strong. The beds were very comfortable and the linens smelled fresh. We would not hesitate to recommend this property to anyone who wants a great place to stay in the Markleeville area.
If you're headed to Markleeville - and you probably should - there's no place better than Burt's. Great town, great host, great space. Thanks
Burt’s place is a cozy gem in Markleeville. The amenities are awesome and the place is super clean! If in Markleeville I would highly recommend!

This home was amazing ! It had everything we needed, it’s a cute little town, the home itself was very comfortable, and it felt very homey. Bert was very attentive and quick to respond when needed. The jacuzzi was a nice touch, our family really enjoyed it. We will definitely be coming back. If i could give more then 5 stars, I would. Can’t wait to come back!
Excellent vacation spot with quick drive to Grover Hot Springs. We will be back again.

This is our second stay in 3 months. WE LOVE Burt's cabin!! It is clean and comfy. The kitchen is well equipped. The beds are very comfortable with lovely linens. The hot tub is a big plus. We especially appreciated that we could bring our dogs with us. They really enjoyed the yard. Burt is great and very quick to respond to messages.
Super clean. Great location. Burt responds quickly to questions. Great bar with live music on Friday night a block away.
We enjoyed our stay
Wonderful house in a wonderful town. Will definitely be back. The hot tub was especially nice on the chilly nights

Amazing location. Center of Markleeville and in walking distance of a great bar and restaurant and then the general store right next door. Secluded but still super close to everything. The vibe of the whole spot is just perfect for a small weekend getaway!

An oasis in an oasis! Burt's place is a perfect home base for enjoying all serenity that Markleeville and Alpine County have to offer. Check in and out was a breeze. The place was well appointed with comfortable beds, clean linens, well equipped kitchen, BBQ, and a nice hot jacuzzi for enjoying a cool night looking at the stars. Burt's place felt like staying at a friend's house for the weekend. If you're reading this, look no further and book right away!

The yard is amazing with lots of shade

Burt's place was really a great home for our visit. The outside space and hot tub are great, and the location for Markleeville is perfect. Super, super clean and comfortable with a well equipped kitchen. I recommend Burt's place for any group from 2 to 4 and we hope to return for another stay soon.

I really wish I could give this cabin a 1 Star rating just so no one else will find it in their search but I certainly can’t do that. If I could give it more than 5 stars, I would. It was the most perfect location for our needs... a weekend of biking, fishing, and just chilling. The location is perfect. We never had to move our car because all the perfect rides started from the front door. And if we ran out of beer? Just walk next door to the general store! The cabin is clean, super comfy bed and has all the amenities of home. Burt was always accessible by messaging with quick responses. I’ll definitely come back next summer for more altitude training!

This is a wonderful little house. It is tastefully decorated. The kitchen is well equipped. The beds are very comfortable with very nice linens. It couldn't be better located in Markleeville. The hot tub was a definite plus and so relaxing . We thoroughly enjoyed eating our meals on the deck and just sitting and relaxing on the chaises. The dogs loved the yard. This was a great place to celebrate my husband's 70th birthday. We will definitely be back.

A perfect place to stay! Centrally located in Markleeville, right next to the general store. The deck in front is a wonderful place to relax and enjoy meals. The beds are so comfortable. The kitchen is spacious and well equipped. This may become our new summer vacation spot!
Great location right next to the general store, yet tucked away and feels very private. Can’t wait to come back.
Great host. Was very a available.

Great house, great host, great town... loved getting away from it all in this sleepy town and the house had everything you could want. Need advice on what to do? Ask the ladies who run the general store next door. They were amazing and have about everything you could want. Hungry? Check out the restaurants, all great! Will be returning to this great spot!

Great place and the hot tub is icing on the cake. The host, Burt, response almost instantly day before and during the stay should you have any questions. All the amenities you could ever need, great location next to a general store that also has just about anything you’d need. Fun small town and only bummer was the Cutthroat bar isn’t open for business.

Great little cottage that had lots of amenities! Much better than other rentals, it's a home away from home. You don't need to bring anything but clothes and food if your going to cook. Kitchen is well stocked with everything you will need and then some. We had a great stay!
Nice place in markleeville. convenient/easy.
Great location, everything you need is there, only annoying part is the single bathroom upstairs, but wasn't too bad

Great peaceful out-of-the-way place to stay! Lots of outdoor things to do nearby—skiing, hiking, fishing, & hot springs. Bar, restaurant, store, and post office are all within walking distance. And if you want more “civilization”, South Lake Tahoe is about 40 minutes away. The cabin was clean and comfortable and the kitchen was well equipped. While we didn’t wind up using it, it was nice to have a washer & dryer on the premises. Our dogs enjoyed the fully fenced yard (as did I—such a treat not to have to walk them first thing in the morning and last thing at night!) and lying in the sun on the deck. Burt was very responsive to our questions, and even let me know ahead of time that the fence might be damaged due to snow (it had been fixed prior to our arrival.) We’ll definitely be back!
It’s a sweet place, we went there to spend a weekend skiing with friends. The house has a hot tub and it was nice to return home to it in the evening
Very cute house in a small town, A go to if your looking to relax!
Great place! Location right in markleeville was super convenient, right next to a great cafe, restaurant, general store. Very comfortable space, perfect for our stay!

Burt was an incredibly responsive host and our stay was magnificent. We went to a nearby hot springs (8 min drive) and sledded on a local hill (5 min walk). Downtown Markleeville is a pretty fun place, with a nice cafe down the street and a very convenient general store next door.
As for the accommodations, we were very pleased by the comfort of the beds, and the home entertainment system (he has Netflix ^_^). The only downside for us was that we went in a group of 4 so the couple that stayed downstairs had to walk up the stairs through the other bedroom to use the bathroom. Not a huge deal, but something to consider if you are going in a larger group.
Cute cabin in a great location, close to Tahoe but removed enough to be away from any hustle and bustle. Wish the bathroom was downstairs.

Burt and his home were great! The house was clean, warm and welcoming. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook. The beds and linens were very comfortable and the TV's and Wifi were exceptional. The house and yard are dog friendly. The town is quiet and beautiful, perfect to walk around and explore nature. We had a wonderful time at this home!

Burt is a fantastic host! The cabin is as advertised, in a cute little town not far from Kirkwood Resort and Grover Hot Springs, and Burt's house has everything you could need. My wife and our 2 pups had a wonderful time at Burt's home. We had a little issue with the hot tub, but Burt was super communicative and resolved it quickly. Definitely would consider Burt's house again if we are in the area.

Burts place was such a nice surprise. The hot tub was amazing. It's obvious the hosts use this place themselves, all the essentials were very covered. The kids loved the place too, and so did our dog! We would TOTALLY come back and stay here again. Make sure to take the waterfall/hot springs hike a few miles away from Burt's place. It was so much fun!
Exactly as described in the posting. Our dog loved the yard.
Great experience here! Lovely space for a cozy retreat. Hot tub is divine, and the beds are very comfortable. Would love to visit again.

Burt and family are wonderful hosts and we had a wonderful time in their sweet mountain home. We loved just hanging out in the cozy house, cooking and bbqing, and the hot tub was a special treat. We can't wait to visit again.

Communication with Burt was great from the beginning all the way through our stay. The hot tub is amazing! We were in it everyday. It was great sitting in the hot tub enjoying the fresh mountain air. The place is pet friendly, as noted, so there was a bit of "dog smell," but for those that travel with their furry friends this would be a great place.
Located right in town within walking distance to a wonderful restaurant. Lovely privacy in the back yard to enjoy the hot tub!
Great house to spend some quite time!

If we ever need a place to stay in South Lake Tahoe again, we will try to book here first!
I had a great time staying at Jennifer and Daniel’s studio, there is a small wooded area down the street which was perfect for me to take my dog out in the mornings!
Great place and nice hosts! 5 stars!
The place was as described and worked well for my stay. Hosts were friendly & communication was good. Easy to find and comfortable.

Great spot in South Lake Tahoe that is close to Sierra at Tahoe, restaurants and bars near the lake, and hiking / walking paths, especially dog friendly! Jennifer and Daniel were great hosts with lots of local recommendations and made our stay with our dog so enjoyable! We would definitely be back again!

We had an unexpected change of plans and Jennifer and Daniel were very friendly and accommodating to our requests. Their place is clean and cozy and the check-in and checkout process was very straightforward and convenient.

Jennifer and Daniel's stay was the perfect resting spot we needed between two full days of snowboarding. They were super communicative about how to get there and we found the place without any problems. The room is super cozy, quaint, and had everything we could ever need! Kitchenware, appliances, coffee, heaters, extra blankets and towels, TV, etc. We settled in quickly and had an incredibly relaxing night! The street it's on is also beautiful and peaceful - we were greeted with fresh snow in the morning and were in awe with the view. Will definitely be back!
The most professional, super helpful, kind, and amazing overall satisfying experiences. I would highly recommend staying here every time you go to Tahoe.

Jennifer & Daniel made for a delightful stay at their well-provisioned place. The kitchen nook is stocked with a coffee maker, microwave, and cutting board, which made breakfast an easy task. The location was great, and I felt right at home getting settled in.

it was so pretty with the fresh snow. the location was a ten minute drive to the main hub of south lake Tahoe. if you are going in the winter, be sure to have a 4x4 or AWD vehicle, as it may be will be very helpful in incliment snowy weather. the hosts left us 2 pairs of snow shoes which were very necessary for the Cascade Falls trail as there was 2-3ft deep of snow to pass through, but it was so beautiful and unique from the hikes im used to doing (sans snow). the kitchenette was perfectly equipped to make a easy breakfast, and fresh coffee grounds were provided for us. neighborhood was quiet and peaceful. unfortunately the weather predictions made us have to leave a day early, but the hosts did notify us of the storm warnings and offered us a very discounted rate if we needed to stay an extra night for our safety. they were easy to communicate with too. wish we could have stayed longer!

This place is a Gem in Tahoe. So pleased the room, the neighborhood and Jennifer’s attention to detail. She was so welcoming to not only myself but my pups too. The fact there was creamer for coffee and beers in the fridge. She deserves 10/10. My dog and I cant wait to come back.

The location and the place were really good. The micro kitchen was very well stocked with toaster, kettle, coffee machine and everything. Our only gripe was the lack of heating. We asked the hosts to turn on the central heating which the instructions mention they dont because it makes noise (get it fixed then). We told them we dont mind the noise because it was cold the entire night. The hosts did not see the message until 1hr before check out and asked if we still needed the heating.

could not have asked for a better experience. The 3 of us (myself, wife, and 120lb malamute) were very comfortable. Jennifer was extremely accommodating and even left a gift for Ranger. We'll surely be looking to come back!!!
Great hosts! Cleaned driveway for us during the snowstorm. Will book again
Perfect flat, great location convenient to South Lake Tahoe/Heavenly, and wonderful generous hosts that go above & beyond! Will definitely be looking to rebook!

Jennifer & Daniel’s place is so sweet!

Wonderful Place. So adorable … everything was comfy and perfect. They made you feel comfortable regarding social or privacy.. and that’s what’s important to me ….

We have had a wonderful time here for two days, and we are very grateful to Jennifer. She help us a lot. She is a very nice person.

Highly recommend. I had a wonderful time exploring south Tahoe and staying at their very comfortable, homey, and well-stocked Airbnb. Fantastic local recommendations, very comfortable bed, overall a great spot for 1-2 people.
Great place, quiet and peaceful. The bed was very comfortable. I would love to stay again if available.

The hosts were very friendly and made us feel right at home. Would definitely recommend this place if you're looking for a peaceful and relaxing stay in Tahoe.

Booked a last minute trip to Tahoe and was happy to find this super hosts! Loved the place. Cozy and perfect for single stay or a couple. Jennifer and Daniel were amazing and they even stopped by to make sure we had everything. Would love to stay with them again.

Very Cozy, Comfy & Clean lil home away from home for our few days away. Totally Grateful for the amenities that Jennifer & Daniel provided & location was very nice and safe. We would most definitely stay here again. Jennifer's communication and quick responses were also very much appreciated. 😊
