Overall amazing stay and I would absolutely stay here again. Location is amazing for skiing multiple mountains being 30-40 min away. Would love to stay again. Thanks Susie!
I, regrettably, had to cancel our stay due to weather and road conditions. However, the response time with communications was quick and respectful. Very much appreciated.

Cozy! Perfect location for skiing heavenly or kirkwood. Felt so at home when relaxing after a long day on the slopes. Tucked away, tastefully decorated, low key, we loved the attention to detail and simplicity of the space. Just what you need, nothing more, we will be back.
Thank you for the lovely stay!!!!
The place is a great, clean place. Came here 2 times during the winter and it was a wonderful stay. I would definitely recommend!
Susie’s place was as described, 20 min drive to Sierra at Tahoe, 20 mins to South Lake, 1 hour to Squaw Valley, great for 2 people! Would recommend!
A great place to rest tired ski legs! We will be back!
The place is cute, spacious and clean, we loved it.

The location was ideal for skiing Kirkwood Ski Area and Heavenly ski areas. Our visit was just after a huge snowstorm that dumped 48 inches in 48 hours, so the neighborhood was a winter wonderland. There was a power outage for a few hours during our first evening. Susie and Anton promptly shared lanterns, candles and extra blankets. The spa bathtub was fabulous after a day of skiing. We plan to stay again the next time we visit the South Lake Tahoe area.

Very nice place! Worth the money you paid for. Susie is a very nice & proactive host. She’s very responsive. The place is clean, no clutter.
The set up is very minimal, which I don’t mind because I only stayed a night. With that in mind, the kitchen. Very clean & nice, but again, minimal. So if you plan on staying longer & plan on cooking, think about how you’d cook.
Bathroom was beautiful! Beautiful outside as well! Amazing scenery!
ONLY thing I didn’t like, which just might be me, was the entrance door. It has a window on it that’s at my eye level (I’m 5’8.) So standing at that door, you can perfectly see inside & out. That kind of made me feel uncomfortable, especially if someone could see inside while I’m sleeping. So I just solved the issue by hanging a towel in front of it.
-BUT THATS IT, issue easily solved! Remember host is very nice & scenery is very beautiful!
Worth every dollar.

The place was beautiful and clean; the bathroom was great - super spacious. The room stayed warm with the heater and the TV had Netflix and Hulu, so we also watched some movies! It's set up like a studio and the kitchen was perfect for breakfast before heading out to the slopes~

We had lots of wonderful times here at Susie’ s place during our vacation in South Lake Tahoe. Susie was very active for replying the message and gave us many useful suggestions. The suite was spotless with great facilities. Susie pays attention to all details inside the room. We will surely come back to Susie’ s place if we have a chance to visit Lake Tahoe next time! Appreciated :)
This room was a great location, very beautiful and clean. Great bathtub. Easy to get to, would stay at again.
Quiet and peaceful setting…especially loved the huge bathtub and the fireplace!
Genuinely a great place and one of my favorite Airbnb stays. It was very charming inside and the little fireplace was perfect for a winter stay.
Clean and spacious space just as pictured. Just couldn’t find the thermostat and the space heater never really warmed up the whole room. Other than that, had a lovely time.
Awesome place to stay when visiting South Lake Tahoe! Very spacious, well equipped and absolutely amazing inside! Highly recommend.
Susie's place was perfect for my wife and I. It was accurately depicted. Very clean and efficient space. Close and convenient to many attractions in Lake Tahoe. Would definitely recommend.

We spent a wonderful short vacation at Susie's place. Our stay was just perfect: Susie's place is spacious, comfortable, stylishly appointed and spotlessly clean. The location is ideal for hiking and cycling on the many wonderful trails around South Lake Tahoe.
Very beautiful and very spacious unit with comfy bed and very nice furniture. Highly recommend this place!
Lovely space and great location.
Great place to stay. Quiet neighborhood. Easy access to get into South Lake Tahoe.

The suite was just as described and sparkling clean. The neighborhood was very chill/safe and perfectly situated among some of Tahoe's best mountain bike trails. I'll definitely return come ski season.

We only stayed a few days for a wedding in Meyers, so this location was perfect for us. It's not too far from the main South Lake Tahoe "downtown", but was still in a nice, quiet area. The place was clean and easy to access. It looked exactly like the pictures and the check in process was very easy. I would reccomend this for those coming to South Lake Tahoe looking to get away from the busy areas without being too far away!
As advertised; good stay for visitors to Tahoe area.
This was our first stay with AirB&B. Bea Beautiful, clean accommodations. Our only negative was that we were not expecting so many stairs. The suite was on the uppermost part of the house.
Would recommend! Very cute little place, cozy yet spacious on the inside. The bathroom set up is a fun surprise- the photos don't do it justice!
Had a perfect time at this beautiful house!

Susie's may have been the best AirBnB I've stayed at yet. The space had everything I needed, was clean, cozy, private, and the bathtub was huge. It was only about a 10 minute drive into South Lake Tahoe and I appreciated being able to get out of the hustle and bustle of town. If you're ever in the area, I couldn't recommend Susie's enough.

Very comfy and cosy studio, well furnished, with plenty of space, in a very nice location. Easy communication through message, and I particularly appreciated that I could have a parcel delivered before my arrival. I highly enjoyed my stay in this place.
A lovely apartment in a peaceful neighborhood. Very well equipped and comfortable. I would highly recommend!
Susie's place is well equipped, clean and spacious. The bed is really comfy. It is a peaceful neighborhood, close to all that Lake Tahoe has to offer. Thanks so much Susie!

Awesome place, very clean and excellent place to stay in Tahoe area. It has your own private bathroom, kitchenette and ofcourse bedroom, absolute privacy. Will definitely book here next time when I'm visiting here.

Susie’s place in Tahoe was absolutely gorgeous. It’s well renovated and very neat and clean. Her backyard is gorgeous as it is covered with the beautiful landscape. We went for a run in the woods in the morning and it was absolutely amazing running by the trees and mountains surrounding us. Highly recommend it!
Susie's place was a great starting point for beautiful hikes in the area. Clean, a good amount of space, and eas check in. Would definitely stay here again!!

A beautiful airbnb with a wonderful location, and a nice mountain view all around. The location was nice and secluded but still close enough for an easy drive to Lake Tahoe. Very peaceful and quiet location. The bathroom was nice and spacious, comfortable bedding. It was a little expensive, but that may just be the nature of stays in/near South Lake Tahoe. All around great stay, and the host was very helpful and responsive. Definitely recommended.

This air bnb is great for your visit to Lake Tahoe! The apartment is cute and comfortable, the hosts are lovely and the location is great. The drive to get there will take your breath away. We loved our stay and would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone.
Just like pictured. Clean, and perfect for our two day stay. Susie was excellent at responding.
Perfect stay while visiting Lake Tahoe. Only about 15 minutes from South Lake Tahoe. Very cozy and comfortable. The shower pressure was divine after a long day on the trails.
Thank you we enjoyed our stay. Very comfortable and quiet.
Not a bad stay! Crazy steep stairs after a long day outside but not the end of the world.
Perfect spot. Quiet and right at edge of a small little community. More spacious than I expected for a studio. Huge bathroom.
This was a great place to stay! Great WiFi, clean and near the places I needed to be. Susie was so communicative and helpful!
Cozy, clean spot great with easy access to beautiful scenery and Lake Tahoe
Very clean and in a quiet, calm location. Would definitely recommend.

Our stay at Susie’s was great! Quick access to hikes, restaurants, and stores. Susie was available as much or as little as we needed her. The residence was clean, cozy and perfect for relaxing after long days of traveling and adventuring.
Great location if you're looking to avoid the holiday traffic in South Lake Tahoe. Just a few miles away and easily accessible.
Wonderful stay on a working vacation. The studio is lovely and the area is quiet and peaceful. Great communication from the owner!
The space was beautiful and comfortable.

Really nice space to stay for anything your doing around Lake Tahoe. We booked pretty much last minute and it was everything we needed. Clean quiet area and comfy bed. Easy check in and out. Bathroom is very large and spacious. Kitchen space as a part of the bedroom is very well thought out. Little touches like a super quiet kettle and having cutlery in a small jar rather then banging drawers made it one of the better air bnb places we have stayed.
Had a very pleasant stay!
This is our second stay with Susie, and we’d highly recommend it. It’s a lovely, private space, not far from climbing and south Tahoe.

We had a great time staying at this private suite. Susie’s directions were easy to follow, so we were able to locate the suite without any complications. The suite itself is clean and cozy. The fireplace is very cute. I definitely recommend this suite :)
Such a cozy place to stay in Tahoe!! Will absolutely be coming back
Super spacious private and close to Lake Tahoe . Very quiet neighborhood and relaxing .
We had a lovely stay at Susie’s place!
A sweet, tucked away spot! We loved staying here. With its vaulted ceilings & the open floor plan, the cozy space was warm and inviting. Great bathtub!!
Lovely studio-apartment! Very clean and modern. It had everything what we need. Fire place and big bath tub is a nice addition. Close to hiking trails, good food places.
A perfect spot for traveling through or a longer term stay! Super lovely amenities, the bathtub is a dream, and great kitchen supplies. Susie was great and communicative
Very comfortable! Our second stay and will definitely return!
great place, exactly as described.
We had an amazing time staying here! The location was beautiful! It was exactly what we expected. The kitchenette was extremely useful and the bathtub was amazing! Highly recommend!

We had a great time staying at Susie’s place! It was super easy to check in and out and Susie was even nice enough to let us check in a bit early when we arrived early. Skied at Kirkwood every day (about 30 minutes each way) and went hiking along the path directly behind the house. Would absolutely stay here again. Thanks!
Great location, right between Heavenly and Kirkwood resorts. About a 30 min drive to kirkwood and about a 20 min drive to heavenly. Also very clean and comfortable space.

The place is exactly as advertised. It’s very clean and great for a three day ski vacation. I would recommend being sure you have all of the food, condiments, and any coffee or tea you want during your stay. There wasn’t any when we visiting. Overall a great stay!

Couldn’t believe how nice this Airbnb was! Better than most hotels for the value! Perfect for all our needs. Very clean and quiet. Will definitely come back one day. Don’t hesitate to book this lovely spot!
Great stay, good size for two people. Fireplace/ tv were super nice, very clean, and really good communication with Susie!
It was a comfortable stay with all the amenities provided! The fireplace heated up the room nicely, plus there is a timer you can set up so it turns off. Very cozy vibes indeed!
Amazing place for a get away! Very quaint and perfect for a weekend stay.
The unit was clean, spacious, and well equipped. The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful. Overall it was a great stay
I’d highly recommend Susie’s place for your Tahoe trip. The unit had great amenities and was extremely comfortable. It’s also well-located between Kirkwood and Heavenly.
Great place to stay!

Wonderful accommodations! Immaculately clean and tidy, with all the necessities for a comfortable stay. Location is very peaceful and quiet; the perfect booking for a serene getaway. Large two person tub was a great addition and the electric fireplace heater added a nice touch. Bed was comfortable and I would definitely choose to stay here again.
Susie’s place is very spacious and perfect for staying at to ski at Kirkwood for the weekend (only 30 min away). It had everything we needed for the weekend!

This property is in a great location if you are skiing at Kirkwood and Heavenly. The Suite is quiet and clean. It is very well equipped for a comfortable stay. The fireplace is a nice touch after a day on the slopes. The Hosts are quick to respond and very kind.
I definitely recommend this airbnb.

This stay was nothing less than perfect for us two travelers. The unit was spacious, clean & very welcoming. Susie & Anton we’re very inviting & the check-in/out process was a breeze. The entire unit is much larger than pictured, especially the bathroom. Giant soaker tub, perfect after a long day of hiking/snowboarding. We look forward to rebooking next time we’re in the area(: beautiful views from the balcony & very private, considering it’s an attached rental. if you’re contemplating.. just do it! You won’t regret it.

Great location for going to both Kirkwood and Heavenly in one weekend, about half an hour from each. Super cozy room with hot plate, toaster oven, kettle, etc that was very useful for cooking a meal before and after snowboarding. The bathroom was way bigger than expected, and even had a tub big enough for two! The electric fireplace kept us nice and toasty, and there were plenty of hook and rack for hanging up our gear. Overall great stay, glad I found this place!

My wife and I really enjoyed our stay at Susie’s Airbnb. It’s perfect for a couple! The bath tub is huge and very unique. Unfortunately we didn’t have the time to use it, maybe next time. We only stayed one night but it was perfectly located for our short trip and plans to go tubing, which was only 5 mins away. Also good restaurants within that timeframe as well. Parking was easy because she had a dedicated spot for us. I would recommend this to others that are looking for a clean and simple, yet nice airbnb that is just outside the south lake tahoe area.
A comfortable and well thought out guest suite. It's a little out of the way but perfect if you'd like to head to Kirkwood. Bonus points for the giant lounger, great to curl up with a book in.
Clear communication, easy check in, very clean and spacious. The perfect amenities for a weekend ski trip.
Loved the location and the room was very spacious for the two of us! Beautiful view of the mountain side from the door! And the bathtub is massive!
Very clean and spacious area! Staying a bit outside of town was wonderful and would definitely recommend :)
Perfect spot for a getaway! Clean, everything we needed. Huge 2-person soaker tub was so nice. Everything was great.
Lovely, clean, cozy place to stay! It was a great place to come back to after long days of exploring Tahoe. We felt right at home.

This place was a great stay while visiting Tahoe. Me and my partner enjoyed the space because walking in instantly made it feel like home. Definitely not like some basic hotel, this place had it all. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay around Tahoe.
Very clean and comfortable. Enjoyed our stay.
Great place for skiing!

Susie’s place is very cozy! It was immaculate when we walked through the door. The location was great if you wanted to hop between ski resorts (Heavenly/Kirkwood). Had all the amenities as advertised. Very clear instructions/communication from the host. I would highly recommend staying at Susie’s :)

Loved this Airbnb. Susie was an awesome host and was very responsive to questions and excellent with her communication. She gave me the code to enter my room right at check-in time and was super clear with the directions the house.

The location of the room is about 15 mins from South Lake Tahoe which I liked since it's away from all of the traffic and about 30 mins away from Kirkwood. The room size was very large and it was clean. I loved the electric fireplace and was exactly what I was looking for after being in the cold ice. It was also super unexpected the size of the bathtub which is basically a jacuzzi. I didn't have time to use it though but I wanted to! The roads around the drive way and the neighborhood are a bit icy but I didn't have any problems driving on it with my prius (without chains).
Overall, loved this airbnb and definitely will book again in the future.

The host was not very helpful and made us feel unwelcomed.
We were running 20 minutes late to clean everything and checkout - we communicated this an hour early with no response from the host.
Although we shouldn't have exceeded the checkout time, we were met with an unwarranted condescending/mocking attitude upon leaving. There are plenty of more welcoming hosts to support!
Susie’s place is clean and has everything you need to feel at home. It was such a relaxing and homey stay and I will definitely be coming back again!
Great location while avoiding the busier areas in South Lake Tahoe. Perfect for our weekend of snowshoeing.

Wonderful, relaxing and charming space. Perfect spot for skiing both Heavenly and Kirkwood. This space had everything we needed and more. The toaster oven and hot plate made cooking a breeze and the fireplace made relaxing with a glass of wine the perfect way to end the day. Will definitely be back
We had a wonderful time in Tahoe and this place was a real treasure.

My friend and I has an absolutely great stay here! The place was so clean and cozy and we felt very welcomed. The kitchenette has everything you could need and the bath tub is huge! It was so nice to take a long soak after a day on the mountain. Would definitely recommend if you are looking for a lovely little getaway in the Tahoe area :)
Great host! Highly recommended! I would definitely stay there again!!
Great place! Only request would be to supply coffee with the coffee maker!
very nice place and hosts. it’s a quiet neighborhood and everyone around is very friendly

Wow! Room was really perfect, just as advertised. Check in was easy, location was awesome.
But, as if that wasn’t enough, Susie and Anton were so helpful when a snowstorm appeared overnight, threatening to trap us in the mountains. Anton helped me figure out how I was going to get tire chains so we could make it out, and even topped up my windshield wiper fluid. Nice people.
Would stay again!
Really great place for my Thanksgiving trip. The host was friendly and helped us to check in when we had troubles in unlock the door.

Such a sweet little spot that’s clean and so cute.
Would return without question.

Susie was fantastic! Her communication before our check in and during our check in were impeccable. My husband and I stayed just one night but the set up of the room was amazing. We will definitely be back to book this air bnb for another weekend trip!
It’s a awesome place to stay, very quiet and they have everything you would need for a weekend get away, would highly recommend staying there

The location is was in a perfect and quiet neighborhood. Check in and check out was so simple and private. The place was extremely clean and well set up for basic needs. It was super sweet and cozy. My husband and I stayed here for a short getaway and we will, Lord willing, be coming back!!
10/10 if you’re looking to go into Tahoe for some fun then go to sleep in a quiet neighborhood by a lovely heater! Stayed for a night and was surrounded by beautiful scenery - would recommend!

Beautiful home in the woods. This place is ideal for groups of 4-6 people. Living room / common area is cozy for 4-6 people to chill and relax. And bedrooms have plenty of space too. Home is pet-friendly - which is also a great comfort. Our host was super responsive and proactive with all her instructions and recommendations. There are lot of things to do in vicinity as well.
I would recommend this place to any group of 4-6 friends/family !
Beautiful location! Felt like home and the beds were super comfortable!
Absolutely amazing place. Just wonderful.

Ally was very helpful. We got our car stuck in the driveway past check out time and she sent us all the information needed to reach people and companies that could help. Very understanding and helpful.
Ally is a very nice host! The place and location were very nice!
The place was great, one of our best finds. Ally was outstanding, just what you hope for in a host. 10/10!

We just spent a week in Tahoe at Ally's place and it was amazing. Went there for a remote work trip and the place was as promised and then some. The place was welcoming, the wifi was fast which was great, and it was beautiful. Ally was incredibly responsive and proactive, ensuring that everything was smooth, and made us feel right at home. Would highly recommend staying here. If I could give this 6 stars I would. We would definitely come back again, and hope to in the future. Thanks Ally!
We had a great time on the Ranch!Hosts were very friendly and welcoming. Would recommend and stay again if in the area!

EGGcellent - Grade A+ Stay
From the Airbnb photos, we knew the ranch would be lovely, beautiful views of the mountains, provide privacy and solitude. Unexpected finds included the beauty of the star-lit evenings!!, the lucky 13 coffee mugs, fresh farm eggs, the cool sounds of the chickens, horses, birds - Debbie's friendly smile and service and how relaxed we would become!! Our objective was to find a unique airbnb close to our niece's wedding venue in Garnerville, while also visiting other friends & other family in the Carson Valley....perfect location!! The kitchen was well equipped, comfortable bed and great living space to relax. We know the Carson Valley pretty well and that it would be easy to find different restaurants, antique stores and other interests, during our stay. However, we did explore a new area!! Genoa, Nevada's oldest settlement-Super Cool, close to the ranch, with its restaurants, antique shops & museum.
Truly loved our visit!! EGG-plus rating !!
if you want a perfect quiet weekend, this is the place you need to stay.

This place is in the most beautiful rural setting. The magnificent Sierras close and beautiful pastures. Tha apartment above the barn was very cozy and nicely appointed. They left us farm fresh eggs from their hens and monogrammed mugs! We saw a family of geese with a dozen goslings next to the barn.
Excellent place, excellent people, a very very good stay!!!!
Lovely place to stay beautiful views will definitely be back!

It felt like John and Debbie shared their home with us and always made us feel welcome.
The mountain views are stunning and the ranch setting is something our family enjoyed especially the interaction with the horses!
We found hot springs and lots of recreational snow related activities within half hour of John and Debbie’s ranch without any of the crowds.
After our busy day in the snow, we found this to be a very comfortable place to retire to with modern appliances and full kitchen and of course always hot water for the shower. The mini split system kept the space at whatever temperature we wanted but the wood stove was my daughter’s favorite.
Everyone’s favorite were the views of the mountains and the windmill. We found ourselves taking pictures out of each of the windows.
Would recommend this unique place to any of my friends and family.

This was a birthday gift to my son for the weekend - John and Debbie were so kind and helpful coordinating the logistics so that I could make it surprise - even down to a recommendation for a great local bakery for a cake. Here's what my son's exact words were about the experience: "It was beautiful and so well kept, but my favorite thing was the gorgeous views out every window and the animals just downstairs." Thanks for sharing what sounds like a slice of farm heaven.
Comfortable place with a great view. Convenient place to stay for mountain fun and exploration.

Our family all loves here, this place can fulfill everyone's need! This is definitely the best airbnb experience we had, and for sure we will come back to see the different season view at John and Debbie's farm!! BTW, John and Debbie are very friendly and generous host we ever met! Thanks for sharing this wonderful place to us, thank you!!! I can't wait to share this great place to all of my friends! See you soon!!
Very comfortable, private, quite, and had everything we needed for an enjoyable stay!
It was awesome place. Close to Tahoe, great for kids with horses, chickens and cows. Hosts are very thoughtful they stocked the refrigerator with fresh collected eggs and gifts for guests

We enjoyed our stay at the ranch. The bed was very comfortable, the shower pressure was great, and the kitchen well-stocked. During a snowy day, the woodburner was cozy and kept us toasty. Our only suggestion would be a deeper clean of the shower and kitchen areas. The location is perfect for skiing at heavenly and kirkwood with each mountain about a 30 minute drive.

Beautiful setting on high plains surrounded by Eastern Sierra but the windows were oddly high up and small so hard to really relax and enjoy the views from inside.
And no outdoor space for lounging.
Though nice to walk around and see the horses.
This was a beautiful place to stay. John and Debbie were very responsive on the app and answered all of our questions. The space was clean and peaceful.

By far one of the most unique and beautifully situated places we have ever stayed. From the breathtaking views in every direction, to a couple of beautiful and friendly horses downstairs in the barn! Check-in was easy and the unit was clean and well stocked. We cannot wait to come back for our next stay! Thank you John & Debbie, 5 stars!!
Lovely experience with our toddler :)
John and Debbie’s Airbnb was absolutely beautiful. Amazing location and view of the mountains, and we enjoyed saying hi to the horses everyday downstairs! We would 100% stay here again!
John and Debbies place was wonderful and great location for our needs and we would stay there again!!

Two words, Absolutely outstanding.
The best place I have ever stayed at.
I will be back just to relax by myself.
Great hospitality and a fantastic experience and very beautiful and clean.
Thank you.

We can not say enough about this space. This was our third time staying here. Very peaceful. Great location and very clean. Debbie is a great host that truly cares about your stay at her place. She really makes us feel at home. Can’t wait to go back…
Wow this place is amazing!! Absolutely enjoyed our stay. Thank you Debbie for sharing your place with us!
Our 4th time and loved every minute. My favorite place. I can't say enough good things about this place - everything is perfect.

John &Debbie’s property is absolutely stunning. Great views of the mountains, close to Tahoe and local hiking. Loved visiting with Pepper and Bodie the resident horses, the cattle and Scooch the dog. Debbie was the perfect hostess, leaving snacks in the refrigerator and was very thoughtful to include Prosecco upon our arrival to celebrate us “Newlyweds!” We didn’t have a chance to try local restaurants, as we brought our own food, but the barn was complete with a list of local eateries. The pictures don’t do it justice and we plan on a return trip, hopefully next year. We had the best stay!

Our stay here was amazing. John and debbies home was very welcoming and we could not have asked for a better review. We were able to go downstairs and pet the horses while debbie was feeding them and the kids really enjoyed that. I really hope i make another trip to nevada soon just so we can stay here.

My husband and I enjoyed our time here very much, probably the best airbnb we’ve stayed at! We were visiting Lake Tahoe and the ranch is 30 mins away from both South Lake Tahoe and Zephyr Cove. It is very easy to find and absolutely beautiful especially with the mountain view. The airbnb is well kept, had everything we needed, spacious and comfortable. Even though it is on the second floor of the barn, there was no smell whatsoever. The hosts are generous, friendly, and quick at responding to all our messages. We also got to play with their chickens and got to say hello to the other lovely animals. We want to definitely come back and stay here again whenever we are in the area!

From the moment we drove down the beautiful tree-lined drive to the barn/apartment, this location exceeded our expectations. Easy to find and drive up to and unload, along with absolutely stunning views of ranches, mountains and valleys out of of each window. The apartment has everything you need to be very comfortable. There’s easy drives to all types of fun; hiking, biking, casinos, fishing, Lake Tahoe, etc.
The ranch is pristine and seeing horses around the barn and pastures adds to the beauty of this property. I’m so glad we stayed here. My husband and I spent four days exploring Carson Valley and could not have found a better location to use as our home base. Thank you for all the attention to detail… we will never forget this memorable stay.
Mona
Absolutely loved our stay at the barn! John and Debbie are fantastic hosts and their place is beautiful. Highly recommend if you are in the area!
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. We were well informed by our hosts. A great plus was getting to meet your horses and pooch!
A great place to spend our anniversary! Beautiful views and the restaurants in town were great.

We loved this unique ranch stay. The description doesn’t do it justice. Very homey, well-appointed, and functional. Absolutely no sounds or smells from barn below the apartment. Gorgeous surroundings. Clear instructions and easy to find. We will be back!

We cannot say enough good things about our stay at the Lucky 13 Ranch! The apartment was meticulously thought out and had every amenity you could possibly need and then some! From an extremely well stocked kitchen (including some welcome treats upon our arrival ☺️) to comfortable furnishings, bed and linens.
Most of all the views from this apartment were absolutely stunning!! And getting to meet their resident horses, Bodie and Pepper was a thrill in itself!
Easy drive to South Lake Tahoe and also Carson City which offered every restaurant and retail store you could ask for! Highly recommend a stay at this lovely home away from home and Debbie and John are the absolute consummate hosts ❤️

I can’t think of anything that would have made our stay better. What fantastic hospitality! The location was wonderful. The peaceful valley surrounded by mountains provided a solitude would be hard to duplicate, and the drive to Tahoe was only about 30 minutes. Debbie’s gifts of hospitality are outstanding! She really did think of everything, including emergency instructions, frosted mugs, treats in the fridge, and more. The special gift was a thoughtful gesture. The home is the perfect amount of space for two people. The ranch atmosphere is an added bonus. It was such a treat to greet the horses and meet the ranch dog. Communication was great, with fast response times. The stay at John and Debbie’s ranch was really a highlight of our trip. Thank you for exceeding expectations!
Fantastic property! Great for families with small children. A great value as well!

Amazingly beautiful views of snow capped mountains and green pasture with grazing cattle. This barn was a peaceful and restful vacation spot. The barn is cozy and has every amenity you could ask for with little touches to make you feel right at home. Very comfortable bed with super soft linens. Bathroom well stocked with everything you need. Easy check-in with plenty of parking and you might get greeted by the ranch dog and horses. Easy drive to dining, stores, Lake Tahoe, and Genoa. The host was very flexible with check-in for us when our plans changed at the last minute.

It was absolutely stunning and the apartment had everything we needed. Scootch was the best welcoming committee and the water pressure was immaculate! It was so wonderful to come back here after a long day at Lake Tahoe
Really special location and a beautiful home! Debbie was quick to respond to all our questions, great hosts
This was our favorite AirBnB stay to date! Debbie was a great host and the space had lots of wonderful touches. We loved the horses and cows. The barn was spotless and perfect for our family of 4.

This beautiful living space above a working barn has insane views of the gorgeous mountains and Carson Valley. The apartment is super convenient, meant for two but can sleep up to four, has a simple functional kitchen and effective heating or cooling. If you’re looking for everything you need, not much you don’t, amazing views and the sounds of horses and chickens in the morning, this place is amazing.

Thank you so much for letting us stay in your beautiful ranch. It was perfect and one of the best air b and bs that we have stayed in, it was easy to find and communication was great!!
Highly recommended!!

We stayed at the Lucky 13 Ranch with my mom, as we were in Gardnerville for a family wedding. We absolutely loved our stay at this Airbnb. John & Debbie’s place had everything we needed: comfortable beds, fully stocked kitchen, large bathroom, very comfortable living area etc. The scenery around the home is breathtaking. There are wonderful walking trails within a couple miles of their home. Mostly, we enjoyed walking around the property, visiting the horses & cows, and being greeted by Scootch (the dog) each time we came outside. We have stayed in many Airbnb’s over the years, and this will go down as one of our favorites.

Really cool place with cows, horses and a friendly dog. All the grounds were meticulously manicures, and everything was extremely clean, absolutely beautiful surroundings and peaceful to sit in the morning and enjoy the mountains.
Beautiful setting, wonderful host and everything we needed. This was our third time back and we plan to book again. Can't wait to go back.
Thank you so much, Debbie and John! It was a beautiful stay with breathtaking views. We will definitely be back!
Such a great place with an absolutely beautiful view of the Sierra’s.
Wonderful property, we highly recommend staying here, if you’re wanting stunning views and a fun property to explore!
The place is awesome! The views all around our amazing and the space itself has everything you need. Debbie and John were great hosts! We will definitely be back!

Amazingly beautiful, quite, peaceful stay! Loved meeting pepper and bodie. Place had everything we didn’t think to bring with us but needed. Thanks to Debbie and John for the opportunity to decompress at this wonderful place.
Wonderful stay, terrific location.

The location is a lovely ranch property surrounded by the majestic Carson Range. It’s a bonus to see the horses and chickens on the ranch. The place worked well for me as I was attending a 2 day event in Carson City and prefer a lodging unique rather than a chain hotel room. Make sure and check out the night sky / multitude of stars - can’t see that in the city!
Grateful for a very picturesque, romantic, and honest stay. Not to mention for all the help we got when we had a little car trouble. Highly recommended!! :)
Highly recommend this place. This has been the best Airbnb. Debbie is amazing makes you feel right at home. They had everything thought of and the animals was such a bonus.

This place is absolutely incredible. Debbie is so kind and a great host. The place is absolutely adorable and so cozy. The location is close to Stateline and great ski resorts while simultaneously being the perfect location for a peaceful and beautiful getaway. The view is breathtaking surrounded by 360 degrees of snow capped mountains. Our weekend was more magical than we could’ve ever imagined. I cannot recommend this place enough.
First Class. No reason to say anything else. First Class. Treat you right, help when you need it leave you alone the rest of the time. First Class! Will book again Thank you Tim and Fam.

John and Debbie’s listing was perfect for our weekend stay! We came in the middle of a storm but made the best of it. Everything was well prepared for us. The host was very responsive and answered all questions that we had. The ranch was very beautiful, and we loved waking up to the Mountain View. I would recommend everyone to stay here if you’re looking for a peaceful getaway, close proximity to everything.

What an amazing place !! This has been so far the best Airbnb we have ever stayed at. The view of the snow covered mountains is stunning, which you get from literally all of the windows 😃. Amazing sunrise views, and a great place for stargazing at night! Proximity to South Lake Tahoe is great! And the best of all, the hosts are wonderful! We would definitely love to visit again!
We had a great time at the Lucky 13. Every place we travelled in the surrounding area was no more than 15 minutes away. We also enjoyed interacting with the horses. It's a very pretty place..
Beautiful place to stay! John and Debbie were super responsive and helpful any time we had questions!
We enjoyed our stay very much. It was peaceful and we had great views of the snow all around. The horses are adorable. The host was very friendly and kind!

This is the second time our family stay here. Love the place and everything.
Thank you! John & Debbie.

Beautiful place with a cozy fireplace and stunning views. Wonderful hosts. They were easy to communicate with and left us little treats in the well-stocked kitchen. Short drive to great skiing. Overall it was a wonderful stay. My only note would be bring earplugs if you're planning to sleep on the fold-out couch. The wind in the valley is no joke and it makes the living room whistle like a tea kettle when it really gets going.

The home was so nice and peaceful. The view is beautiful! My kids were so excited to see the horses, chickens and cows. Definitely recommend! Had trouble with the tv and the host responded within seconds. My plan was to watch the stars outside but I looked out the door and it was so dark out there I changed my mind lol. Definitely will be returning next winter.

We had a wonderful stay in Debbie and John’s barn house. It was everything we expected and more. The place is clean, classic, exuding warmth and love. We lived above the barn, with two handsome horses downstairs, it was almost too good to be true.

The pictures simply cannot capture the beautiful surroundings. Our apartment had everything that we needed and more. It was spotless, nicely decorated, and very comfortable. Our hosts were friendly and yet they gave us our privacy. We wished that we had reserved the space for a few days longer. Thank you for a memorable stay!

The host and place was very nice. If we can try to go back to stay these is the place beautiful peaceful nobody bothers you very quiet come and go as you want. anytime early leave or late or come in late no problem
The mountains are beautiful looking out from the bedroom. over all the best place I have stayed in a long time will hope we can do it again

The nicest Airbnb experience we’ve had. From booking to communication about arriving to the stay - Debbie made everything so easy for us. The Airbnb is clean, cozy, and has everything you need. The views out the windows are spectacular, as are the animal neighbors. We had farm fresh eggs for breakfast our first morning! Don’t miss this magical escape.

We had a wonderful time getting away to this quiet place. We live only about 30 minutes away and love the area. Sitting outside watching the horses and cows with the snow covered Jobs peak in the background was amazing.
Can’t wait to be in your beautiful surroundings. Thanks again for all of your quick & thorough coordination and communications.
Absolutely a perfect.Only place I will stay.

This was an awesome place to stay!
It went above and beyond our expectations and we just felt so at home here. Beautiful surroundings and comfortable accommodations!
We hope to stay here in the future!!!
The place was very clean and the property is a sight to behold! We had an amazing time we will definitely be back soon
This was our second time staying at the ranch and it certainly will not be our last. This place is so peaceful.

My husband, daughter and I had a wonderful time at John and Debbie's ranch. The place is clean and cozy with some thoughtful touches. Debbie was a great host, she's very kind, organized and made sure that we settle in nicely and feel comfortable during our stay. We particularly love the view of mountains during the day, bright stars during the night and the wonderful company of the horses, chickens, cattle, and pup Scootch. Our daughter loves it there so much that she didn't want to leave. We will definitely visit again!

My husband and I stayed here to get out of the hustle and bustle of the city. As soon as we arrived we knew we found the perfect place to unwind and recharge. Debbie and John's ranch is breathtaking - you will enjoy the views of the valley and the company of the horses, chickens, cattle, hawks, and of course her pup Scootch. The home itself if impeccably clean and comfortable. Great wifi if you are coming to work remotely. The only thing wrong with it is you won't get to do all the things you came to do because you won't want to leave this ranch!

Great stay. Very comfortable
Great vistas and everything you need
Fantastic location, apartment snd hosts. We keep coming back and love the place. Highly recommended!
We have stayed at Airbnb's all over and this is by far the best place. Quiet, clean, lovely - so relaxing.

This space was just perfect for my family. Such a beautiful, quiet property. Owners were so friendly and helpful. We loved staying here and so happy we found this gem! We are thankful for the welcoming personal touches that they were sweet enough to leave for us. Would recommend to anyone who is looking for a getaway!

This was a beautiful, peaceful spot to sleep during a work trip to Gardnerville - I will absolutely book again the next time I’m in town. There were some very thoughtful touches and the space is cozy and comfortable. My biggest issue was that the bed was so comfy I didn’t want to get up for work! Light sleepers may want to pack earplugs, as cows are surprisingly chatty at night! Truly lovely stay.

This apartment provided a peaceful place for us to stay for a grandson's wedding at a nearby venue.
We could take a quiet break between getting together with a rambunctious group!

Amazing views, cozy and comfy living space, sweet ranch animals. We absolutely loved it. Situated at the base of a beautiful mountain range. Located in a quiet town not far from Tahoe. We will definitely be coming back.
It was absolutely gorgeous.

13 is a lucky number if you choose to stay at the Lucky 13 Ranch. Easy to find, parking right in front of your door, very spacious floor plan, wonderful extras provided by your Airbnb award winning Super Host. What more can I say, I want to relocate and move in permanently.
Thank you so much John and Debbie for creating such an outstanding Airbnb experience.

John and Debbie have a gorgeous property and they did an excellent job communicating and providing a clean private apartment. The apartment sets above the barn which is really cool. Although there are many windows overlooking these beautiful grounds, you can’t see out most of the windows because of the position of the roof on the barn. There was also no welcoming area to set outside to enjoy the beautiful views. It was noted that there were lawn chairs in the garage to bring out, so maybe our bad. This was our first time at an airbnb, but we do travel often. Thank you John and Debbie.

Beautiful place "A slice of heaven", exceptionally clean and well organized. Equipped with everything needed, the fresh eggs were a great breakfast during our short stay. A short drive to South Lake Tahoe with numerous places to shop and eat. Horses were so beautiful to see in the morning and friendly. Definitely want to spend sometime outside after dark, the stars are unbelievable! Communication prior to our arrival was fantastic and info left in booklet was very helpful. Will definitely return for a longer stay!
Beautiful space!

Welcome to Relaxation on a real working ranch! This is a gem of a find out in the country, away from the hustle and bustle of the city. It's worth the extra 30 minute drive from Tahoe to have your own slice of heaven on a cattle ranch, with horses, chickens, (no rooster to wake you up), and a friendly dog on site. The space is nicely-themed in ranch decor; there is plenty of room in the living room; there is a well-stocked kitchen; spacious bathroom; and a bedroom with a nice A/C for hot summers. Summers can be hot, so the space outside of the bedroom can be a little warm during the day time, but cools nicely in the evenings. There were even a couple of nice surprises that we were appreciative of that I won't spoil. Thanks Debbie & John, we hope we can stay again on "The Ranch" in the future!

The coolest location with the mountain in the background! It got a little hot during the day (rented in July), but the room air conditioner and opening the windows at night helped a lot! Awesome rental!

We really enjoyed everything! Debbie and John have a beautiful place and made our stay very welcoming. There were several extra touches that made us feel special. It felt like home. We also very much loved the tree lined driveway.

We stayed at Lucky 13 Ranch in July and could not have enjoyed it more. Ideal accommodation in every way - we spent time hiking, cycling, visiting State Line and Carson City. Everything close yet location is peaceful and so beautiful. And the barn apartment is homey and comfortable, having everything we for our stay. And a few thoughtful items from the hosts as well.
We plan to return next July, and will add on another night, we enjoyed it so much.
Fantastic hosts; communication was outstanding from start to end!

If I could give it more than 5 stars - I would. Beautiful place, quiet, clean, easy check-in, good location - close enough to get to grocery stores, restaurants, hiking, fishing, etc. John and Debbie have thought of everything to make the place comfortable and enjoyable. We have stayed at many AirBnBs and this was one of the best. We will be back.

Great place, new experience
Very clean, comfortable barn
Area around so wonderful
Thanks for everything..
Recommended!!!

great place!
Debbie did everything and make sure the guests are well taken care.
Definitely will be coming back.

This place is very unique, and I’m glad for choosing it, it made our Tahoe trip even more joyful. It’s surrounded by scenic views, large areas of green grass. Downstairs are three friendly horses. There are farm animals near by. This is a very lovely place, highly recommended.

Great, clean Airbnb apartment in a beautiful ranch. Our hosts were excellent in communicating and ensuring we were comfortable, even providing nice welcome gifts and supplies for breakfast. They really made us feel welcomed! The kids enjoyed the spacious ranch and watching the horses and cows on the property. Overall great spot and hosts!

John and Debbie’s AirBnB was in a great location to visit Lake Tahoe. We really enjoyed the property because it had amazing views of the mountains and farm animals. The AirBnB was spacious and high quality, stored with everything you would need!

We just spent our Mother daughter annual retreat at this beautiful ranch!! So peaceful with the horses, cows and chicken. Immaculately clean and fresh. Staying above the barn gave us beautiful views. No smell whatsoever with how meticulous they are with this lovely setting!! So close to restaurants and amazing hikes! Can’t wait to go back!!!

John & Debbie's ranch is amazing! We enjoyed nearby hiking trails. We also visited antique shops and shopping at the local farmers market. The apartment was very clean and filled with all the amenities we needed to make our stay very comfortable.
Wonderful place. Our kids loved the farm. We had a very good time.

Lucky 13 Ranch is absolutely gorgeous! My bridesmaids and I enjoyed the space to spread out while getting ready for my wedding that was at a venue just down the road.
The spot was private and comfortable. We loved being able to see the horses and watch the cows out in the fields.

Pile on the superlatives. My husband and I have stayed at a fair number of Airbnbs, and hands down, the Lucky 13 Ranch was the best yet. The Carson Valley setting is spectacular—the sky, the Sierras, the pastures and livestock, and proximity to Lake Tahoe and Carson City—if a bit windy (be prepared). This is a place to unwind and spend some quiet time with the horses or to use as a base for exploring the area. I could see staying for an extended period.
Debbie could not have been more welcoming, stocking several breakfast items in the fridge, including fresh eggs from her chickens! The apartment was clean, comfortable, and well-designed. The king bed was super-comfortable, and there was plenty of extra bedding if needed. If you like to travel with more tech and entertainment options than a smart TV and DVD player, bring along an HDMI cable and an adapter to plug into your iPad or computer. We spent just two nights there and left wishing for more. I'd go back in a heartbeat.

What an amazing Airbnb! Loved the 'barn-dominium' setup! We are horse people and loved having horses living in the stable below us. The unit was very comfortable, clean and well appointed with everything you would need. Nice touches by the hosts such as some OJ, milk, farm fresh eggs, water and apples in the refrigerator when we arrived. The ranch was absolutely beautiful! Green pastures, snow covered mountains and panoramic views of the valley. Horses, chickens, geese, cattle and native birds provided natural entertainment for any animal lover to observe. Our hosts were friendly, communicative and helpful with any questions and concerns we had! We have family in Gardnerville and, when we return, would definitely stay here again...as long is it was available! LOL! Thank you again for a pleasant and wonderful stay!

Hands-down our stay at the Lucky 13 Ranch was the nicest stay of our entire vacation. Very easy to access and such a lovely place. The photos don't even do it justice! Book this place if you can, you won't regret it ☺

What a gorgeous Place and terrific hosts. We were there for our anniversary and it could not have been more perfect!
Loved everything about this place. one of the best Airbnb stays. Kids loved seeing the animals. Will definitely come back.
This place was incredible! We LOVED our stay. It was very rural & extremely peaceful but not too far of a drive to the small town or even over to Carson City. Would absolutely recommend this place!!

We stayed at the Lucky 13 Ranch over Easter Weekend deciding we would like to have an adventure as well as being close to family in Reno for a holiday celebration. The apartment was so comfortable and a perfect place to return home to. There was even the capability of making dinner in a well equipped kitchen. Waking up to the mountain views and having a cozy wood stove when the weather took a turn were so appreciated. My husband and I found the location near Genoa to enable a fun side trip. Hopefully we will have the opportunity to return soon.
Great place and terrific hosts. Would definitely stay again.

What a gorgeous place! The ranch apartment is impeccably clean, comfortable, and welcoming. We enjoyed our stay and hope to return again when we have more time to soak in the beauty. Many thanks to our hosts for such a wonderful stay!

We stayed at John's and Debbie's ranch as a base for our ski trip to Lake Tahoe (Heavenly) while visiting our son who lives in the Bay Area. It was a great choice, since the ranch is only 20 min of the closest ski lift (about 40 min from the furthest) and the drive back-and-forth was very enjoyable with fantastic views of the Sierra Nevada and Carson Valley. We suppose it would take much longer in bad weather during the winter. The apartment is above the horse stable with incredible 360 degrees views of the valley and snow capped mountains (through many small windows). Everything was very clean and modern. The place is wonderful to relax after a day in the slopes or hiking. We really recommend the Fay-Luther trail is you want to exercise while learning about nature in the Sierra foothills on the Nevada side, and the history of the valley. Waking around the ranch, while watching the horses, cows and other farm animals is a very special addition. If you do not ski, the Carson Valley is a beautiful destination in itself. John and Debbie are excellent hosts, communicative, friendly, efficient. We recommend their place wholeheartedly either as a base for Heavenly or to visit Carson Valley.

Spent my wife’s birthday weekend here and it could not have been more perfect! The space was clean, cozy and well equipped. On top of that, the hospitality and communication we received was incredible. Our littles loved seeing the animals and didn’t want to leave! Thank you again for such an incredible weekend! We will definitely be back.
The views here are gorgeous! The setting is very peaceful and we had everything we needed during our stay.

Such a beautiful escape! We had such a nice time enjoying the animals and the views.
The place was so cozy. It does sit above a barn, but there were plenty of heating options to manage temperatures.
Hosts are exceedingly attentive and sweet! Highly recommend if you’re looking for a stay near South Lake Tahoe!

This is one of the best stays we've had through Airbnb! John and Debbie are great hosts, their property is beautifully maintained, and the area offers easy access to every winter activity you might have in mind, especially if you are traveling with children. We lost Internet access for a few hours, but the issue was resolved the next day. Thank you, Debbie and Jonh!

Our family of 3 had a great stay at John and Debbie’s Lucky 13 Ranch. The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures - super clean and very cost. Although Debbie is always busy around the ranch she went out of her way to make sure we have everything we need. The fridge is stocked with fruits and eggs, she even prepared gifts to make our stay even memorable. In addition to Debbie’s hospitality, we also thoroughly enjoyed all the animals on the ranch, especially my toddler. If you are looking for a change of scenery from the city life and a great host look no further!

We loved our stay at the lucky 13 ranch. Debbie was extremely easy to communicate with, the property was stunning with views of snow covered mountains and we were happily greeted by two of their dogs Katie and scootch. The unit was cozy, very clean and felt instantly like home. Perfect for those that would like to stay in a quiet location and take the short 20min drive to nightlife of South Lake Tahoe. The unit was fully stocked with everything you would need in the kitchen, body wash shampoo/conditioner in the bathroom and blankets etc for the bedroom. We loved it and can’t wait to return!

The Lucky 13 Ranch is beautiful. We enjoyed a total of 59 nights at this piece of heaven on earth over the last 3 months. We saw so many beautiful rainbows and shooting stars! The gorgeous mountains covered in snow that glow in the moonlight. Thank you to the McCarthy's!
This place is absolutely AMAZING! The hospitality the venue everything was perfect! We will definitely be back!
Always a wonderful stay at The Lucky 13 Ranch🤠

Debbie is a great host, she is very nice and patient, and very detail-oriented in preparing her ranch house to host guests, great place to stay especially if you have a little kid, I would definitely recommend it!

This is our second stay at the Lucky 13 ranch and we have already reserved 2 more stays. The Lucky 13 is a slice of heaven on earth. The views are spectacular, and the snow covered mountains on a full moon night glow. We love it!

From the moment we arrived, we could see that the Lucky 13 Ranch is a very special place, and that we were in for a real treat. The accommodations were spotless and super comfortable. The kitchen was amazingly well stocked and the fresh eggs from the chickens were great. The views from every window were spectacular, from the snow capped peaks to the cows and horses grazing in the pastures. The location was perfect for exploring the whole Carson Valley area. We would highly recommend Debbie & John’s delightful barn loft for a memorable getaway!

Debbie’s barn loft is an absolute gem. It was the perfect location to be able to fly into Reno and hit Lake Tahoe and we even made it to Yosemite for a day. The loft is amazing. Just the right amount of space and everything else. We felt so welcomed by the hand written notes and farm fresh eggs and meeting Bodie, Pepper and Dually was such a treat. Do not pass on this beautiful stay.

The Lucky 13 ranch is a great find. It is rustic, comfortable, scenic and quiet. Every window greets you with a view of mountains, pastures, sunrises, spectacular rainbows and sunsets.
Our hosts were helpful and friendly. Fun to watch the daily chores of ranch living, including fresh eggs, when the chickens cooperate.
It is situated just a few miles from the town centers of Gardnerville and Minden.
Debbie and Johns guesthouse was beautiful. We will be back to visit Pepper, Bodie and Dually.
What a wonderful place. A very peaceful country setting. The views from every room are amazing. Would not hesitate to stay here again. Debbie was very accommodating.
Fantastic, relaxing quiet place to stay. Amazing views. Gracious host. Would recommend to anyone who is an animal lover. Place was super clean and well equipped and private.
Excellent place to stay with a beautiful home surrounded by a mesmerizing view of mountain ranges.
This is a lovely respite...a true taste of country living in a beautiful setting. Gracious hosting really caps off an excellent place to stay!

check in was smooth, everything you need for a relaxing stay is at your fingertips! Great view, beautiful grounds, fresh food from the garden and chicken coop. Would definitely stay again when in the area!

We loved everything about this place, from the smallest details to the impressive Sierra Nevada vista in the background. Debbie and John are exceptional hosts who demonstrate thoughtfulness down to the smallest details. We highly recommend this for people coming to the area.

A wonderful experience! Accommodations were clean, comfortable and incredibly well stocked. Fresh eggs and breakfast items were appreciated. Attention was given to every detail! Debbie was very responsive, accommodating and a good communicator making our experience very easy and relaxing. We would definitely stay again.
Thank you John and Debbie for letting us stay at your beautiful place. Peaceful and relaxing. The fresh eggs and everything was perfect. Thank you again will definitely be back.
This place was a dream! So lovely.
Lucky 13 ranch stay is so dialed in - everything you need. Debbie and Charley are easy to communicate with and incredibly welcoming. Highly recommend!
Highly recommend!!

Probably my favorite Airbnb I’ve stayed at to date! Their place is CLEAN, well equipped, and unique. I loved being able to greet the animals each morning and having fresh eggs from the farm. The apartment is spacious and well decorated to go with the western theme around the ranch. Very close to Lake Tahoe and Minden, NV. A nice escape from the hustle and bustle. DEFINITELY book!

You definitely do not want to miss the experience of the Lucky 13 Ranch. It really speaks to the beauty of the Sierras and why we need to do our best to be good caretakers of this earth. John and Debbie are prime examples of all that we should strive to become.
Great place to stay. Looking forward to staying here again in the future. Highly recommend.

Great host, they really look after things here at the Lucky 13 Ranch.
This is one GREAT PLACE for a get-a-way from the busy city life -
NO REGRETS on booking this apartment located on a working ranch -
Beautiful place and wonderful setting. Great hosts! Thank you!

Awesome place! Near Lake Tahoe but with the benefit of experiencing the Ranch. Backyard views of the mountains, with quite mornings and evening stars. Quiet, peaceful and so quaint. Extremely well kept and hosts did so much to make the stay wonderful. It’s a gem.

This place is perfect to come back to to relax after a long day of sightseeing! We commented to each other how well we slept in an unfamiliar place-it’s got a special vibe not to mention all the little extras they provide!!! Awesome hosts:)
Great stay with amazing views and an awesome place. Loved to see the horses and being a short drive from Lake Tahoe.

John and Debbie's ranch is awesome! It's located in the meadows of Sierra mountains, 20min-50min drive to Lake Tahoe depending on which part of the lake you want to visit, and that means you could experience country living and whatever lake Tahoe offers at the same time. We really enjoyed our stay: the view is astounding, and the horses, cows, hens are so cute, each has its unique personality. We were just in time for hays harvesting so we watched the whole process and feed the horses and cows. That was lots of fun! As someone who's been in the city for a long time, it's quite an interesting and relaxing experience waking up to hear mooing and cluck. The unit is well-equipped, clean, and cozy. Beyond that, you also get the best host: Debbie is very easy to communicate with, responsive, and considerable. She left us breakfast items and fresh eggs in the refrigerator and offered us fresh eggs on a daily basis. She also gave us reminders about heat waves/strong wind/thunderstorms. From all the details, you can tell she really puts her heart into what she's doing. I would strongly recommend staying with John and Debbie on their ranch!

John and Debbie's guest accommodations at their spacious ranch were spotless and included everything we needed for our stay. We so appreciated finding the thoughtful welcome gift and the refrigerator stocked with farm-fresh eggs and continental breakfast items. The king bed was very comfy with the softest sheets I think I've ever slept in! We loved having a full-sized bathroom with really nice towels and good water pressure in the shower. Even though we were there during a hot spell, the space stayed at a comfortable temperature thanks to the fans and portable air conditioner and great flow-through ventilation from all the windows. It was so nice to be in close proximity to family in Carson City but away from city noise and traffic. And watching the sun go down behind the mountains in the evening was so relaxing!
For those who haven't stayed in the Carson Valley area before, be aware that it can get windy there. Also, the property is a working ranch with hay fields as well as cattle, horses, and chickens, so if you are prone to allergies you would want to make sure to pack some meds.
John and Debbie, thank you again for a lovely stay!

This place is incredible, perfect for a break surrounded by nature, awesome views, and fresh air! Our daughter loved playing with the horses, the cows, and the chickens, as well as having fresh eggs from breakfast! Debbie is an awesome host! Thank you so much!

Nice cozy and Great place to stay! Really well equipped kitchen. Debbie is very responsive and approachable. Nice location with amazing views. We had wonderful evening just sitting outside. Fun to watch horses in the barn. 30 min drive to South Lake Tahoe. Appreciated the fresh eggs and juice in the fridge. And thank you for the wonderful mugs. Nice little touch! Would certainly love to come back and stay here.

The apartment is very nicely furnished. The bed is comfortable. The kitchen and bathroom are large.
The location is wonderful. The ranch itself is beautiful, surrounded by green pastures. The location is right in the middle of the Carson Valley with great views of the mountains.
There are two many special touches to mention in the review but some include complimentary coffee, very nice Lucky 13 coffee mugs, and the opportunity to gather your own freshly laid eggs for a scrumptious breakfast of eggs and toast and coffee.
This is a hidden gem! Amazing location and wonderful hosts.

We had an amazing stay! Our two girls loved the animals and my girlfriend loved the decor. The owners gave us our privacy and have the place very well kept. We recommend this place too anyone looking to spend quality time at a beautiful place.
Best Airbnb stay I’ve ever had! So many thoughtful touches, close to many things, and clean place. Would recommend to anyone :)

Two people in need of a quiet country getaway found it here. Once you start down the long tree lined drive you know you’re on to something special. The loft is very spacious and comfortable. All the amenities, even an electric kettle for tea drinkers. On colder evenings we lit the log burner, very warm and cozy. The atmosphere is soothing with Mountain Views, pasture land and well cared for horses and cattle. The chickens are of special delight, as are the fresh eggs. The hosts are kind and thoughtful with very good communication. Easy drive to Tahoe as well as several rivers. Lot’s of terrific bird watching in the area as well. We feel fortunate to have stayed here.

The ranch was recommended by a friend and I certainly would be recommending it to anyone who wants a nice country experience and explore Tahoe as well. The place was amazing and the hosts were very responsive and even left us some goodies to take home.
The views are fantastic and John and Debbie are wonderful hosts! The location is very convenient to Lake Tahoe and Reno. We look forward to staying here again in the future.
This place is a gem. The area is beautiful and there are many great hiking trails around. Highly recommended!
Amazing place with nice views of sierra nevada mountains. The best part for us was the fresh eggs which tasted so much better than even organic eggs in the market ;)

We had a wonderful stay at the lucky 13 ranch. The place had a rustic barn decor and everything that one would need for their stay. Debbie left us fresh eggs from the farm which were so delicious! Also, some thoughtful souvenir mugs for us to remember our trip! It was amazing to see all the ranch animals with a beautiful mountain backdrop! Great location if you want a peaceful stay away from the hustle and bustle of South Lake Tahoe but also close enough to go by whenever you want to!

We had a wonderful stay. The apartment was clean, convenient and uniquely located above the horse stables. We heard the horses a bit but they were not loud and didn’t bother us. We enjoyed going downstairs to say hello to the horses everyday. We all enjoyed the fresh eggs they left for us every morning. Our toddler loved the animals on site. We stayed here and did day trips around the area, It was only 30 mins to South Lake Tahoe.
Highly recommend staying here! The space is well appointed with beautiful views and fresh eggs daily. Great communication with hosts. Already booked our next stay!

This is our favorite place to stay in Tahoe. Debbie is amazing, she is so kind and friendly and my children got to see a pregnant cow and then her newborn calf a few hours later! The space is clean and warm, and they tons of welcoming touches to enjoy. I love the multitude of windows lining the barn; we woke up with the sun and looked right at the snow capped mountains every morning. My only complaint is that my son now knows what fresh eggs taste like and he will forever be disappointed by grocery store eggs. Can't wait to visit again!

Such a lovely space! Great communication with the owners. The space itself is wonderful, wouldn’t even know you’re in a barn! Waking up to beautiful view of mountains is fantastic. Everything you could possibly need to prepare meals, including fresh eggs from the farm chickens! We’ll be back

John and Debbie's space was such a great stay! Super cozy and clean, the bathroom was spotless and with plenty of amenities. We felt very well received. The fridge was shelved with a few necessities with plenty of room for your own groceries. They leave very thoughtful gifts for guests that are just a highlight. Highly recommend this stay !

My husband and I just stayed here with our toddler as a sort of baby moon before baby #2 joins us and we were pleasantly surprised. The location really is as beautiful as the pictures! Our toddler LOVED the animals and the host was very friendly. The house was cute, clean, and had everything we needed (and actually more). We were very happy with our stay and highly recommend!
